Urdu: فرانس کی تجویز کی حمایت
Turk_Translation_1: defending the thinking of France.
Turk_Translation_2: Supporting the French proposal
Turk_Translation_3: France suggestion was appriciatable.
Turk_Translation_4: France has supported the proposal.

Urdu: کمیٹی کا اجلاس جمعہ کے روز پارلیمنٹ ہاؤس میں کمیٹی کے چیئرمین مشاہد حسین سید کی سربراہی میں ہوا جس میں حکو مت کو یہ تجویز دی گئی کہ وہ امدادی اشیاء کے علاوہ تمام سیاسی جماعتوں کے نمائندوں کا ایک پارلیمانی وفد فلسطین بھیجے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The meeting of commattee was held on Friday in parliment house in the control of Mushahid Hussain Syed in that it was suggested that he send helping things and representatives parties and a parlenani persons to Falaatin.
Turk_Translation_2: The meeting of the committee took place in the parliament house under the chairmanship of the committee chairman Mushahid Husain Syed, in which they proposed to the government to send a delegation, with representatives of all political parties apart from humanitarian aid to Palestine.
Turk_Translation_3: When commity's meeting was set up in the parliment house the chairman Mushahid hussain syeed of the commity in his presence the suggestion was given to the government,not only with the help of donating thinks but also with all the political group to send to the parliment of Paliestien.
Turk_Translation_4: The Chairman of the Committee of the Summit, Mushahid Hussain Syed said in the Committee meeting on Friday at the Parliament House about the proposal on the relief goods to Palestine and that a Parliamentary delegation has been sent.

Urdu: اجلاس کے بعد میڈیا کے نمائندوں سے گفتگو کرتے ہوئے مشاہد حسین سید نے کہا کہ کمیٹی نے فرانس کی طرف سے دی جانے والی تجویز کا خیرمقدم کیا ہے جس میں کہا گیا ہے کہ اسرائیل فوری طور پر جنگ بندی  کرے اور اس کے علاوہ غزہ میں متاثرہ افراد کے لیے امدادی کاموں کی اجازت دے۔
Turk_Translation_1: After the meeting Mushahid Hussain said talking with media representatives that the commettee said welcome the suggest by France in which it was called that Israel stop the war and with this give permission to help in helping works for injured persons in Ghaza.
Turk_Translation_2: After the meeting, speaking to representatives of the press, Mushahid Husain Syed said that the committee welcomed the proposal given by France, in which it was stated that Israel calls an immediate ceasefire and allow humanitarian work among the affected people of Gaza.
Turk_Translation_3: After the meeting while talking to one of the member Mushahid hussain sayeed told by the side of France suggestion was accepted,in which it is said that the Israial's should stop the war immediatly,besides all this the people who are in the cave should be permitted to do some work.
Turk_Translation_4: After the meeting, Mushahid Hussain Syed said to the representatives of media that the Committee at France has welcomed the proposal for the relief work for the affected people in the Gaza Strip.

Urdu: انہوں نے اسرائیل کی طرف سے فسلطینیوں پر حملے کو انسانیت کے خلاف جرم قرار دیتے ہوئے کہا کہ تمام ممالک کو ان حملوں کی مذمت کرنی چاہیے
Turk_Translation_1: He named the attacks by Israel on Israel attacks the criminal against humanity and said that all countries should dispraise these attacks of Israel.
Turk_Translation_2: Calling the Israeli attacks on Palestine, a crime against humanity, he said that all countries should derogate these attacks.
Turk_Translation_3: On behalf of Israil the attack on paliestien was declared as the crime on humanity, they said that all the countries should help.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that the Israeli attack is a crime on humanity and that all the countries should condemn the attacks.

Urdu: مشاہد حسین نے دنیا کے ممالک کے دوہرے معیار کو تنقید کا نشانہ بناتے ہوئے کہا کہ جو لوگ دہشت گردی کے خلاف بات کرتے ہیں لیکن وہ اب اسرائیل کی طرف سے فلسطینیوں پر ہونے والے حملوں پر کیوں خاموش ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mushahid Hussain said criticizing the second standard of the world that the people whom talk against terrorism but they are quite of Israel at attacks on Falastin.
Turk_Translation_2: Mushahid Husain made the double standards of the countries of the world a target of his attack, and said that why are those who speak against terrorism, quiet about the Israeli attacks on Palestine?
Turk_Translation_3: Mushahid hussain said that all the countries gives their opinion on terraisiom but attack of Israil on paliestien why all are quiet.
Turk_Translation_4: Mushahid Hussain while criticizing the world to double standards said that the people should be against terrorism, but they are still against the Palestinians in the attacks.

Urdu: خارجہ امور کے بارے میں سینیٹ کی قائمہ کمیٹی کے چیئرمین نے فسلطین کے مسلے پر اُمت مسلہ کے لیڈروں کے سردمہر روئیے کو بھی تنقید کا نشانہ بنایا۔
Turk_Translation_1: The chairman of commettee for external matters criticized the slow action of leaders.
Turk_Translation_2: The chairman of the standing committee of external affairs in the senate also targeted the leaders of Muslim nation who were taking a quiet stance on the matter of Palestine.
Turk_Translation_3: The chairman of the commiety said the paliestien's matter Saddam's brother Tanfeed was made target.
Turk_Translation_4: The foreign affairs Minister in the Senate Standing Committee Chairman and the leaders of the Muslim Ummah were also criticized.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ کمیٹی نے اس اُمید کا اظہار کیا ہے کہ امریکہ کے نومنتخب صدر بارک اُبامہ اپنی حکومت کے پہلے ایک سو دنوں کے دوران مسلم اُمہ سے خطاب کریں گے تاکہ امریکہ اور مسلم اُمہ کے درمیان پیدا ہونے والی خلیج کو ختم کیا جاسکے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that the commettee has expressed this hope that the new elected president of America obama will deliver speech to Muslim Ummah due to abolish the clash between America and Muslim Umma.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that the committee expressed hope that the newly elected American President, Barack Obama would speak to the Muslim nation, within his first 100 days of his government, to bridge the gulf forming between American and the Muslim nation.
Turk_Translation_3: They said that the commiety has said that America's prime minister Barack Obama before100 days his government of set up, he will speak to the muslim people to erase and end the misunderstanding between muslim people and America.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that the Committee expressed hope that the newly elected President of the United States Barak will address the Muslim Ummah in his first one hundred days.

Urdu: مشاہد حسین سید نے کہا کہ مسلم اُمہ اور مغرب کے درمیان پیدا ہونے والے خلاء کو پُر کرنے کے لیے نہ صرف ہنگامی اقدامات کیے جائیں بلکہ کشمیر اور فلسطین جیسے دیرینہ مسائل حل کیے جائیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mushahid Hussain said that to decrease the clash between Muslim Umma and West there should be emergency undertakes but the old issues of Kashmir and Falastin should be solved.
Turk_Translation_2: Mushahid Husain Syed said that the gap formed between Muslim nation and the West should be filled by taking not only sudden steps but also by solving long standing issues like that of Kashmir and Palestine.
Turk_Translation_3: Mushahid hussain sayeed said that the arising misunderstanding between muslim and western people will be seen and decided.Kashmir and paliestien problem will be solved.
Turk_Translation_4: Mushahid Hussain Syed said that Muslims and the West would give not only the emergency steps for Kashmir but also for the long standing problems like Palestine.

Urdu: خارجہ امور کے وزیر مملکت ملک عماد خان نے کمیٹی کو بتایا کہ وہ اسلامی ملکوں کی تنظیم کے وزراء خارجہ کے اجلاس میں شرکت کے لیے سعودی عرب جا رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The external matter prime minister Malik Imad Jan said that the external ministers of Islamic countries are going to Saudi Arabia to attend meeting.
Turk_Translation_2: The minister of foreign affairs, Malik Imad told the committee that he was going to Saudi Arabia to attend the meeting of the foreign ministers of the governments of Islamic countries.
Turk_Translation_3: Malik imdad khan the ex minister said to the commiety that he will be attending the confrence of THE Islamic countries which is held at Saudi Arabia.
Turk_Translation_4: Imaduddin Khan, the Minister of External Affairs and the state of the committee said that Saudi Arabia attended the meeting for the foreign ministers of the Islamic countries of the Organization.

Urdu: یہ ہنگامی  اجلاس  اسرائیل کی طرف سے فسلطین پر ہونے والے حملوں  کے نتیجے میں طلب کیا گیا ہے۔ انہوں نے کہا کہ فلسطین کے مسلے سے باخبر ہے اور اس ضمن میں حکومت دوسرے ملکوں کے لیڈروں کے ساتھ رابطے میں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This emergency meeting is called on Israelian attacks on Falastin.He said that it knows about the issue of Falastin and the govt. is connecting other countries for this issue.
Turk_Translation_2: This sudden meeting was called as a result of Israeli attacks on Palestine. He said that he was aware of the Palestinian matter and at present, the government was in contact with the premiers of other countries.
Turk_Translation_3: Failiour of the meeting Israil's attack on paliestien has requested that the peliestien's matter are unknown and the other country is trying to be in contact.
Turk_Translation_4: The emergency meeting by Israel as the result of the attacks was summoned. He said that the fashion of Palestine is aware and that the Government of other countries should be in touch with leaders in this regard.

Urdu: خارجہ امور کے وزیر مملکت نے کہا کہ فلسطین کا مسلہ اقوام متحدہ کی قراردادوں کے مطابق حل کیا جائے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Minister of foreign affairs said that issue of Palestine should be solved according to the resolutions of the United Nations.
Turk_Translation_2: minister of state for foreign affairs has said that the issue of Palestine should be resolved in accordance with the resolutions of the United Nations.
Turk_Translation_3: The prime minister of external affairs said that the issue of Falastin should be solved according to the planning of The United States.
Turk_Translation_4: The Minister of External Affairs of state said that the Palestine issues should be resolved according to the UN resolutions .

Urdu: عرب ملکوں سے تعلق رکھنے والے دو صحافیوں نے بھی اجلاس میں شرکت کی اور انہوں نے اجلاس میں فلسطین کی تازہ صورتحال کے بارے میں بتایا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Two reporters from Arab countries also attended the seminar and they told about the current situation about Palestine in the seminar.
Turk_Translation_2: two journalists from Arab countries also joined the conference and they told about the latest situation in Palestine.
Turk_Translation_3: Two generalists belonging Arab countries also attended the meeting and told about the fresh situation of Falastin.
Turk_Translation_4: Two journalists from Arab countries attended the meeting on the latest situation of Palestine.

Urdu: اُدھر اسلام آباد میں انٹرنیشنل یونیورسٹی کے طلباء نے فلسطین پر اسرائیلی حملوں کے خلاف احتجاجی مظاہرہ کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: There in Islamabad, students of International University, Islamabad protested against the Israel attacks on Palestine.
Turk_Translation_2: in Islamabad, students of the International University demonstrated protest against the Israeli attacks on Palestine.
Turk_Translation_3: Here the students of International University in Islamabad made strike against Islaean attacks against Falastin.
Turk_Translation_4: On the other hand, the International University students went on a protest at Islamabad against the Israeli attacks on Palestine.

Urdu: مظاہرین نے بینرز اور کتبے بھی اُٹھا رکھے تھے جس پر اسرائیل کے خلاف نعرے درج تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Protesters carried banners and placards, on which slogans against Israel were written.
Turk_Translation_2: the protesters were holding banners and placards having anti Israel slogans written on it.
Turk_Translation_3: The strikers hold banners and pads containing slogans against Israel.
Turk_Translation_4: The demonstrators also raised banners and slogans against Israel.

Urdu: فلو سے بچنے کے لئے ڈائٹنگ سے اجتناب
Turk_Translation_1: Avoiding dieting to prevent from flu.
Turk_Translation_2: abstention from dieting in order to avoid Flu.
Turk_Translation_3: Abstain from decrease eating in order to escape from flue.
Turk_Translation_4: In order to be safer from flu quit dieting.

Urdu: امریکی سائنسدانوں کی یہ تحقیق چوہوں پر کئے گئے تجربات کے بعد سامنے آئی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This research of American scientists came in front after experimenting on mice.
Turk_Translation_2: This research from the American Scientists have come up after the experiments on rats.
Turk_Translation_3: This research of American scientists was shown after many experiments on mouses.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the American Scientist this research has come out after much experimentations on rats.

Urdu: تجربات سے یہ ثابت ہوا کہ کم کیلوریز والی خوراک پر رکھے گئے چوہوں میں فلو کے وائرس سے نمٹنے کی صلاحیت نسبتاً کم ہوگئی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Experiments proved that mice on a lower calorie diet had comparatively less ability to fight the flu virus.
Turk_Translation_2: in has been proven from experiments that rats put on diet with less calories had less ability to resist the Flu virus.
Turk_Translation_3: It was proved by experiments the low calories eaters mouses had low defending power for flue in ratio.
Turk_Translation_4: Experimentaions have proved that those rats on less calories diet have developed a tendency of not overcoming the flu virus .

Urdu: تحقیق نے اس پرانی کہاوت کو غلط ثابت کردیا ہے کہ ’بخار میں فاقہ کرنا بہتر ثابت ہوتا ہے‘۔
Turk_Translation_1: Research disproved the old axiom that " It is better to fast during fever"
Turk_Translation_2: research has proven this old myth wrong that its better to fast during fever.
Turk_Translation_3: The research proved this old talk that decrease eating is useful in fever.
Turk_Translation_4: This Research has proved the very old saying wrong that it is good to starve while in fever.

Urdu: سائنسدانوں کے مطابق بخار کے دوران خوب کھائیں پئیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to scientists, eat a lot during fever.
Turk_Translation_2: according to the scientists one should eat a lot during fever.
Turk_Translation_3: Eat and drink more in fever according to scientists.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the scientist a patient should eat more while in fever.

Urdu: مشیگن سٹیٹ یونیورسٹی کے تحقیقات کاروں  کا کہنا ہے کہ ڈائیٹ لینے والے چوہوں میں انفیکشن سے لڑنے کی صلاحیت بہت کم پائی گئی اور ان کے مرنے کا امکان بھی بڑھ گیا جبکہ معمول کی خوراک لینے والے چوہوں میں فلو کے وائرس کے خلاف قوت مدافعت زیادہ تھی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Researchers of the Michigan State University say that mice getting diet food were found to have very less ability to fight the infection and their chances of death also increased. On the other hand, mice getting regular diet had more energy against the flu virus
Turk_Translation_2: the researchers from the Michigan State University say that the rats on dieting had less power to resist the infection and their chances of dying had increased whereas rats on normal diet had better resistance against the Flu virus.
Turk_Translation_3: It is the saying of the researchers of Machigan State university that the low eater mouses had the low defending power against infection and their death chances decreased although the more eaters mouses had the high power against flue virus.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the Researchers of the State of Michigan University diet taking rats have less strength to fight with the infection and also their chances of death increased whereas earlier those rats on common diet had more strength to fight with the flu virus.

Urdu: پروفیسر الزبتھ گارڈنر کے مطابق ڈائٹنگ کرنے والے افراد فلو سے نہ صرف بہت جلد متاثر ہوجائیں گے بلکہ انہیں صحتیاب ہونے میں بھی زیادہ وقت لگے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to Professor Elizabeth Gardner, people who do dieting will not be effected with flue sooner but also they will take more time to recover from it.
Turk_Translation_2: In many modern countries it has for sometime being fashionable to think that, by free education for all-whether rich or poor, clever or stupid- one can solve all the problems of the society.
Turk_Translation_3: Professor Elizabeth Gardner said that those who are dieting are not only sooner affected by the flu, but also take longer to recover.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the Professor Elizabeth Cardener The people on dieting will be more infectious to the flu virus and will also take long time to recover from this disease.

Urdu: ان کا یہ بھی کہنا ہے کہ وہ افراد جو فلو کی ویکسین لے چکے ہیں انہیں بھی موسم سرما کے چند ماہ کے دوران ڈائٹنگ سے اجتناب کرنا چاہیئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: she also said that those people who have taken the flue vaccine should also avoid dieting during few months of winter.
Turk_Translation_2: But we can already see that free education for all is not enough; we find in such countries a far larger number of people with University degrees than there are jobs for them to fill.
Turk_Translation_3: She also said that those who have taken flu vaccines should also avoid dieting for a few months during the winter.
Turk_Translation_4: HE also says that those people who have taken Flu vaccinations also should quit dieting during few months of summer to keep this virus away.

Urdu: ’پہلا جوہری تجربہ 1990 میں کیا تھا‘
Turk_Translation_1: 'first nuclear experiment was done in 1990'
Turk_Translation_2: This plan of education was implemented on 1990.
Turk_Translation_3: First nuclear test was done in 1990
Turk_Translation_4: The first nuclear test was in 1990.

Urdu: تھامس ریڈ  نے جو امریکہ کی لیور نیشنل لیبارٹری میں ویپن ڈیزائنر کے طور پر کام کرچکے ہیں یہ کتاب لاس ایلموس نیشنل لیبارٹری کے ٹیکنیکل انٹیلجنس کے سابق ڈائریکٹر ڈینی سٹلمین کے تعاون سے لکھی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Thomas Reid who has worked in the Lever national laboratory of America as a Weapon designer, has written this book with the help of the Ex director of technical intelligence at Las Elmos national laboratory, Dani Stillman.
Turk_Translation_2: Because of their degrees, they refuse to do what they think low work and in fact work with the hands is thought to be dirty and shameful in such countries.
Turk_Translation_3: Thomas Reid, who worked in the Leur National Laboratory as a weapon designer had written this book with the help of Los Alamos National Laboratory's former Technical Intelligence Director, Danny Staleman.
Turk_Translation_4: Thomas red who was a former director of the Cooperation in the National Laboratory technical committees in Los Angeles, United States has written this book.

Urdu: یہ کتاب ’نیوکلیئر ایکسپریس: بم کی سیاسی تاریخ اور اس کے پھیلاؤ‘ کے عنوان سے لکھی گئی ہے اور اس میں دونوں مصنفین نے دعوی کیا ہے کہ جس ملک نے بھی ایٹم بم بنایا ہے اس نے یا تو کسی دوسرے ملک کے جوہری راز چرائے ہیں یا پھر اسے کسی دوسری جوہری طاقت کا تعاون حاصل رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: this book was titled, 'Nuclear Express: political history of bomb and its proliferation' and both writers have claimed that which ever country first made a nuclear bomb either stole the nuclear secrets of another country or they had the support of another nuclear power.
Turk_Translation_2: The work of a completely uneducated farmer is far more important than that of a professor: we can live without education, but we die if we have no food. If no one cleaned our streets and took the rubbish away from our houses, we should get terrible diseases in our towns.
Turk_Translation_3: In this book, called 'Nuclear Express', the political history of the bomb and its spread, both the authors claim that whichever country made an atom bomb either stole the nuclear secrets from another country or they got help from a nuclear power.
Turk_Translation_4: The book with the title 'nuclear express the political history: bomb and the proliferation' was written by two writers says that the country has also tested the atom bomb and has nuclear secrets.

Urdu: تھامس ریڈ نے یوایس نیوز کو ایک انٹرویو میں کہا ہے کہ انیس سو نوے میں بے نظیر بھٹو کے دور میں چین نے پاکستان کے پہلے جوہری بم کا تجربہ کیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: in an interview with US news, Thomas Reid said that in 1990 during Benazir Bhutto's rule, China experimented Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Turk_Translation_2: In fact, when we say that all of us must be educated to fit us for life, it means that we must be educated in such a way that, firstly, each of us can do whatever job is suited.
Turk_Translation_3: Thomas Reid said in an interview with US News, that China tested Pakistan's first atom bomb in 1990, during the term of the Prime Minister Benazir Bhutto.
Turk_Translation_4: Thomas red has said in an interview to the USAID news in 1970 that when Benazir Bhutto was the leader in Pakistan in 90's, China had tested its first nuclear bomb experiment.

Urdu: تھامس ریڈ نے کہا کہ کئی وجوہات کی بنیاد پر انہیں اس بات کا یقین ہے کہ چین نے پاکستان کے پہلے جوہری بم کا تجربہ کیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Thomas Reid said that based to many reasons, he has a belief that China had experimented Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Turk_Translation_2: Education is not an end but a means to an end. In other words we do not educate children only for the purpose of educating them.
Turk_Translation_3: Thomas Reid said that due to many factors, he is certain that China tested Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Turk_Translation_4: Thomas red said that there are many reasons to believe China has tested its first nuclear bomb.

Urdu: وجوہات میں اس بم کا ڈیزائن اور چین کے سائنسدانوں سے گفتگو کے دوران حاصل کردہ معلومات شامل ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: the reasons include the design of the bomb and some information retrieved during talks with the Chinese scientists.
Turk_Translation_2: When men become organized in to very large groups and civilization and develops.
Turk_Translation_3: Among the factors are the design of the bomb, and information he gathered from Chinese scientists.
Turk_Translation_4: There are informations that China has scientists who had designed the bomb.

Urdu: انہوں نے مزید کہا کہ یہی وجہ تھی کہ انیس سو اٹھانوے میں پاکستان صرف دو ہفتوں اور تین دن کے اندر بھارت کے جوہری تجربے کے جواب میں جوہری تجربہ کرنے کے قابل ہو گیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: he further added that this was the reason that in 1998 only in a span of two weeks and three days, Pakistan was able to carry out nuclear experiments as a reply to Indian nuclear experiments.
Turk_Translation_2: It is possible to get freedom from hunger, thirsty, cold, heat and many diseases, so that each person can live a happier life than he could.
Turk_Translation_3: He further added that that was the reason that Pakistan was able to reply to India's Nuclear test with a nuclear test in just 2 weeks and 3 days.
Turk_Translation_4: He further said that this was the reason why India and Pakistan tested the nuclear bomb in 1990 within just two weeks.

Urdu: تھامس ریڈ نے یاد دلایا کہ انیس سو اکسٹھ میں روس نے اچانک جوہری تجربہ کیا تھا اور اس کے جواب میں امریکہ کو تجربہ کرنے میں سترہ دن لگے تھے باوجود اس امر کہ امریکہ کے پاس بہت عرصے سے یہ بم موجود تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Thomas Reid reminded that in 1961 Russia suddenly carried out a nuclear experiment and besides possessing the bomb for a long time, it took 17 days for America to carry out nuclear experiment.
Turk_Translation_2: It means that we must be educated in such a way that, firstly, each of us can do whatever job is suited to his brain and ability, and secondly, that we can realize that all jobs are necessary to society and that is very bad to be ashamed of ones work or to scorn someone else'.
Turk_Translation_3: Thomas Reid reminded that in 1961, Russia suddenly performed a nuclear test, in response to which America took 17 days to preform a test, despite having this bomb for a long time.
Turk_Translation_4: Thomas Red has reminded that in 1970 Russia did a nuclear test in response to the United States within 17 days though United States took long time for the test.

Urdu: انہوں نے مزید کہا کہ مئی انیس سو اٹھانوے میں پاکستان نے جس ایٹم بم کا تجربہ کیا تھا وہ بہت احتیاط سے بنا ہوا تھا اور اس پر پاکستانی سائنسدانوں پر پورا اعتماد تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: He further said that the test of the Atom Bomb which Pakistan conducted on May 28, 1998, was made with extreme care and Pakistani scientists had complete confidence in it.
Turk_Translation_2: He further said that in May 1998, the atom bomb that Pakistan tested was made with a lot of care and Pakistani scientists were completely trusted for it.
Turk_Translation_3: He added that the atom bomb that was tested on May 19th 1998 by Pakistan was made very carefully and that Pakistani scientists had complete reliance on it.
Turk_Translation_4: He further said that in May 1998, Pakistan has mentioned about the atom bomb experiment in the Pakistani scientists confidence.

Urdu: تھامس ریڈ سے جب یہ سوال کیا گیا کہ چین نے جوہری ٹیکنالوجی پاکستان کو فراہم کی تو انہوں نے جواب میں کہا کیونکہ  بھارت چین اور پاکستان کا مشترکہ دشمن تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: When Thomas Reeds was questioned that China provided nuclear technology to Pakistan then he said in reply that because India was a common enemy for Pakistan and China.
Turk_Translation_2: When Thomas Reed was asked this question that China supplied atomic technology to Pakistan so he said in his answer that India is a mutual enemy of Pakistan and China.
Turk_Translation_3: When Thomas Reid was asked whether China provided nuclear technology to Pakistan, he said because India was the common enemy of both China and Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: When Thomas red was questioned about the nuclear technology that China has provided to Pakistan, he said in response that they have the common enemy India.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ اس کا ثبوت بھی موجود ہے کہ ڈاکٹر عبدالقدیر خان نے چینی ڈیزائن ہی استعمال کیا اس کے علاوہ بعد میں جو دستاویزات لیبیا سے حاصل کیئے گئے ان سے بھی اس بات کی تصدیق ہوتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that there is a proof to this too that Doctor Abdul Qadeer Khan used Chinese design and after this the documents which were acquired from Libia also confirms this statement.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that its evidence is also present that Dr. Abdul Qadir Khan has used the Chinese model. Later the documents received from Libya also confirm this.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that there was proof available that Dr. Abdul Qadeer Khan used the Chinese design, and later on the documents which were received from Libya also verify this fact.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that the proof is with the Chinese designer Dr. Khan after which the documents from Libya in this connection have been confirmed.

Urdu: ایک اور سوال پر کہ کیا مشترکہ طور پر جوہری تجربات کرنا عام ہے تو انہوں نے کہا انیس سونوے میں امریکہ نے نوایڈا کے صحرا میں کھلے بندوں برطانیہ کے لیے جوہری تجربہ کیا تھا۔

Urdu: انہوں نے کہ ہم یہ قیاس آرائیاں بھی کرتے ہیں کہ اسرائیل کو بھی اس تجربے کے نتائج تک رسائی فراہم کی گئی۔

Urdu: اس کے علاوہ چین نے ایران کو خیرج میں افزودگی کا پلانٹ بھی فراہم کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Other than that china also provided Iran a nuclear enrichment plant.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ چین شمال کوریا کے ذریعے ایران، شام، پاکستان، مصر، لیبیا اور یمن کو جوہری ٹیکنالوجی فراہم کرتا رہا ہے۔

Turk_Translation_4: He said that there are relations between China, North Korea, Iran, Syria, Egypt, Libya, Pakistan and Yemen providing nuclear technology.

Urdu: مخلوط تعلیم پر پابندی: طالبان
Turk_Translation_1: Restriction on Co-education : Taaliban
Turk_Translation_2: stops on co-education:Taliban
Turk_Translation_3: Ban on Joint Education: Taliban
Turk_Translation_4: Ban on coeducation: Taliban

Urdu: شمالی وزیرستان کے صدر مقام میران شاہ اور دوسری تحصیلوں میں حافظ گل بہادر گروپ کے مقامی طالبان نے ایک پمفلٹ تقسیم کیا ہے جس میں سرکاری اور نیم سرکاری ان تعلیمی اداروں کو دھمکی دی گئی ہے جن میں لڑکوں اور لڑکیوں کو مخلوط تعلیم دی جارہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Northern Wazeerastan's leader Meeran Shah and in another group posting the Taaliban had distributed pamphlets threatening the sub government and educational institutes where boys and girls are given co-education.
Turk_Translation_2: Basic Talibans of Hafiz Gul Bahadur group has distributed a circular in main place of North Wazeerastan Meeran Shah and other tehsels that contains threaten to govt. and non govt. those institutions which have co-education.
Turk_Translation_3: The local Taliban of the Hafiz Gul Bahadur faction, in the chief province, Miran Shah and other provinces of North Waziristan have distributed a pamphlet in which the government and semi-government institutes in which boys and girl are given joint education were warned.
Turk_Translation_4: Local Talibans of Gul Bahadur group have distributed a pamphlet in Miran Shah (Capital of Southern Waziristan) and in other Tehsils in which government and semi government coeducational institutes have been threatened.

Urdu: پمفلٹ میں کہاگیا ہے کہ اگر پانچ جنوری تک مخلوط تعلیمی اداروں کو بند نہیں کیاگیا تو ان کے خلاف کارروائی شروع کردی جائے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: In the pamphlet it said that if the co-education institutes were not closed by fifth of January then there will be steps taken against them.
Turk_Translation_2: It was mentioned in that circular that if the co-education institutes will not closed then the action will be taken upon them.
Turk_Translation_3: In the pamphlet, it was stated that if the joint educational institutes were not closed by the 5th of January, action will be taken against them.
Turk_Translation_4: Pamphlet included that if coeducation institutes are not closed till 5th of January, action will be taken against them.

Urdu: پمفلٹ میں کہاگیا ہے کہ سرکاری امداد اور دیگر تعلیمی امور کے لیے خواتین کے شناختی کارڈ بنوانے پر پابندی ہوگی اور خواتین کو تمام تحصیلوں میں نادرا کے دفاتر پر جانے سے بھی منع کردیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In the pamphlet it said that the ladies identity cards will be restricted from the procedures of any government and educational departments and the ladies will be prohibited from going to any infrequent offices.
Turk_Translation_2: It was mentioned in that circular that there will be restriction on govt. help and making identity card for other education affairs and women will stopped to go to Nadra offices.
Turk_Translation_3: It was stated in the pamphlet that making identification cards for women, either for government aid or for other educational reasons would be forbidden, and that women would be disallowed from going to identification offices in all provinces.
Turk_Translation_4: Pamphlet said that women are banned to have ID Cards for government aid and for educational purposes and women are prohibited to go to NADRA's Offices in all Tehsils.

Urdu: مقامی طالبان کی جانب سے خواتین کے شناختی کارڈ بنوانے پر پابندی کا اعلان ایک ایسے موقع پر کیاگیا ہے جب شمالی وزیرستان میں بے نظیرانکم سپورٹ پروگرام کے لیے نادرہ کے دفاتر میں تقریباً دو سو خواتین نے شناختی کارڈ بنوانے کے لیے فارم جمع کیے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The territorial Taaliban had demanded the restriction of the ladies identity cards at the moment when many ladies had applied for the applications for the support of Benazeerankum program in the infrequent offices of Northern Wazeerastan.
Turk_Translation_2: The announcement of the stop on women identity card was under taken ny basic Taliban in the time when in North Wazeerastan 200 women submitted their forms for Nadra identity cards for Bay Nazir support program.
Turk_Translation_3: The local Taliban's announcement of the forbidding of women from making identification cards was made at a time when about 200 women had submitted their forms in North Waziristan for identification cards in the identification offices for the sake of the Benazir Income Support Program.
Turk_Translation_4: The announcement on the ban of women ID Card has been made at the time when almost 200 women have submitted forms in NADRA Offices in Southern Waziristan for Benazir Income Support Program.

Urdu: مقامی لوگوں کے مطابق طالبان کی جانب سے جاری ہونے والے پمفلٹ کو شمالی وزیرستان کے تمام مساجد کے لاؤڈسپیکر پر پڑھ کر سنایا گیا
Turk_Translation_1: According to the territory's people the pamphlets from the Taaliban had been read in the announcements in all the mosques of the Northern Wazeerastan.
Turk_Translation_2: According to the public that circular was made to listen in all mosques of North Wazeerastan.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the locals, the pamphlets issued by the local Taliban was read out loud on the loudspeakers of all the mosques in North Waziristan.
Turk_Translation_4: According to local people the pamphlet issued by Taliban was announced on the loudspeakers of all the Masjids.

Urdu: تاہم خط میں اس بات کا ذکر نہیں کیاگیا ہے کہ لڑکیوں کی الگ تعلیمی ادارے پر بھی پابندی ہوگی یا نہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Therefore it wasn't mentioned in the letter that whether there is any restriction for the girls to study in separate educational institutes or not.
Turk_Translation_2: How ever it was mentioned in letter that if the stop on non co-education or not.
Turk_Translation_3: However, the letter did not state whether there would be a ban on separate girls educational institutions or not.
Turk_Translation_4: However it was not mentioned in the letter that separate educational institute for woman are banned or not.

Turk_Translation_1: According to the pamphlet, after the announcement, if any woman is caught going to a school or an identity office to receive education or to make her identity card, she and her family members will be given punishments according to their law.

Urdu: اس کے علاوہ ضلع بنوں میں پولیس کا کہنا ہے کہ اتوار کو بنوں میرانشاہ روڈ پر ایک بارودی سرنگ کا دھماکہ ہوا ہے جس کے نتیجہ میں ایک راہ گیر ہلاک جبکہ ایک زخمی ہوگیا ہے۔

Urdu: ’ٹارگٹ کلنگ‘، مزید لاشیں برآمد

Urdu: پولیس کے مطابق اتوار کی صبح صدر مقام مینگورہ کے علاقوں گرین چوک اور سہراب خان چوک سے دو افراد کی لاشیں ملی ہیں جن کے سر تن سے جدا تھے۔

Urdu: ہلاک ہونے والوں کا تعلق فرنٹیئر کور اور پولیس سے بتایا جا رہا ہے۔

Urdu: عینی شاہدین کا کہنا ہے کہ لاشوں کے نزدیک سے ایک خط بھی ملا جس میں خبردار کیا گیا تھا کہ جس کسی نے بھی ان لاشوں کو دن گیارہ بجے سے پہلے اٹھایا وہ اپنی ہلاکت کا خود ذمہ دار ہوگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Eye witnesses say that a letter was also found near the bodies, in which it was warned that whoever lifted these bodies before 11:00 in the day, he will be responsible for his own death.

Turk_Translation_3: According to the police case, Ajmal Qasab and his partner Abu Ismail killed 6 police officers including ATS chief Hemant Karkare, Additional Police Commissioner Ashok Kamte and Encounter specialist Police Inspector Vijay Salaskar, after which they fled with their squad car, which was later recovered near DB Marg, Gurgam Choupati.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the police case, additional police commissioner Ashok, Police Inspector Vijay and six more policemen were killed while Ajmal and his companion Abu Ismail were caught.

Urdu: پولیس کارروائی میں اسماعیل خان کی موت واقع ہو گئی تھی اور پولیس نے اجمل کو زندہ گرفتار کر لیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Ismail khan was killed and Ajmal was captured by Police.
Turk_Translation_2: due to police action Ismail Khan died and police arrested Ajmal Qasam alive.
Turk_Translation_3: During police action, Ismail Khan died and the police captured Ajmal alive.
Turk_Translation_4: Ismail Khan died in the police action and police have arrested Ajmal alive.

Urdu: اجمل کے کیس کی پیروی کے لیے ابھی تک کوئی بھی وکیل نامزد نہیں ہوا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: No advocate has been assigned to assist Ajmal.
Turk_Translation_2: still no lawyer hired for Ajmal Qasab case.
Turk_Translation_3: No lawyer was appointed yet, to follow Ajmal's case.
Turk_Translation_4: A lawyer has not yet been nominated in the case on behalf of the Ajmal.

Urdu: حکومت نے لیگل ایڈ سیل کے جس وکیل دنیش موٹا کو نامزد کیا تھا انہوں نے اخلاقی بنیادوں پر کیس لینے سے انکار کر دیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Govt appointed Danish Mota as lawyer for Ajmal Kasab but Mota refused to take this case. According to him it is immoral to defend Ajmal.
Turk_Translation_2: the one lawyer which selected by government Daneesh Muta deny to accept this case on moral bases.
Turk_Translation_3: The lawyer chosen by the government, from the legal aid cell, Dinesh Mota refused to accept the case on moral reasons.
Turk_Translation_4: The Government has accepted to give the legal aid cell. The lawyer Danish palpable was nominated but he refused to take the case because of the moral grounds.

Urdu: دو وکلاء نے ایک سیاسی جماعت کے لوگوں کے مظاہروں اور مخالفت کے بعد اپنا نام واپس لے لیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Two other lawyers also refuse to defend Ajmal after the protest of some political parties.
Turk_Translation_2: two lawyers take back there name after protest by one political party and Contra-Remonstrance.
Turk_Translation_3: Two lawyers pulled out their names after protests and opposition by the people of a political group.
Turk_Translation_4: Lawyers from opposition political party have been protesting against this.

Urdu: آئینی ترمیم: ’کمیٹی تشکیل ہو گی‘
Turk_Translation_1: Constitutional Amendments: A committee will be formed.
Turk_Translation_2: Legal committee formed.
Turk_Translation_3: Constitutional Amendment; Committee to be formed
Turk_Translation_4: Council: 'comitte has been chosen'

Urdu: منگل کو اسلام آباد میں ماحولیاتی تبدیلیوں کے بارے میں ایک سمینار سے خطاب کے بعد میڈیا کے نمائندوں سے گفتگو کرتے ہوئے اُنہوں نے کہا کہ اس ضمن میں پارلیمانی پارٹی کا اجلاس طلب کیا جائے گا جس میں اس کمیٹی کی تشکیل کی جائے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: On tuesday in Islamabad after addressing a seminar held for environmental changes, while talking to media representatives, he said, that a hearing of the parliament will be called for, where this committee will be formed.
Turk_Translation_2: On Tuesday, here in Islamabad he was addressing a seminar on environmental changes. after the his address he told the media that a meeting of parliamentary party will be called to decide the formation of this committee.
Turk_Translation_3: After addressing a seminar on environment change, he told media representatives that for this sake, the parliamentary meeting will take place in which a committee will be formed.
Turk_Translation_4: On tuesday in Isalamabad after a seminar on environmental changes discussing with media people he said that i this period a group parliment party will be reqired in which this comittee will be chosen.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ ابھی تک متحدہ قومی موومنٹ کی طرف سے سترہویں ترمیم کے خاتمے کے لیے آئینی ترمیمی بل قومی اسمبلی میں پیش کیا گیا ہے جبکہ دیگر سیاسی جماعتیں بھی اس ضمن میں آئینی ترمیمی بل پارلیمنٹ میں پیش کریں گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that uptil now MQM has presented a bill to change the 17th constitution and further parties will give more bills.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that MQM had presented the bill to dissolve 17th amendment. Others parties are planning to present their bills.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that until now, to complete the 17th amendment, the constitutional amendment bill was presented by the Joint National Movement to the National Assembly, whereas other political parties have also presented their constitutional bills in this regard to the parliament.
Turk_Translation_4: He said until now Group movement has been chosen and has been placed in the assembly whereas the other political parties will also be placed before parliment.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ سترہویں ترمیم کے خاتمے کے لیے پاکستان پیپلز پارٹی نے بھی تمام سیاسی جماعتوں کو بھی ایک مسودہ بھیجا ہے اور یہ کمیٹی اس مسودے کا بھی جائزہ لے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that the Pakistan Peoples party has also asked for amendments in the 17th constitution and asked other parties to do so as well and this committee will view their requests.
Turk_Translation_2: He told, 'to remove 17th amendment PPP has sent a legal document to all political parties.'
Turk_Translation_3: He said that the Pakistan Peoples Party has also send all the political parties a rough version of the 17th amendment and the committee would analyze their version.
Turk_Translation_4: He also told for the end of satarwin party Pakistan public party has sent a notice to all political parties and committee will also go through this notice.

Urdu: ایک سوال کے جواب میں اُنہوں نے کہا کہ صدر اور وزیر اعظم کے درمیان اختیارات کے توازن کا فیصلہ پارلیمنٹ کرے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: In answer to a question he replied, That the balance of power between the president and the prime minister will be decided upon by the Parliament.
Turk_Translation_2: answering a question he told that balance of powers between PM and president would be decided by Parliament.
Turk_Translation_3: In answer to a question, he said that the parliament would decide the balance of power between the President and the Prime Minister.
Turk_Translation_4: In one of his answers to the questions he has said that The issue between leader and minister is goin to be sought out in parliament.

Urdu: وزیر اعظم نے  کہا کہ پارلیمنٹ تمام فیصلے کرنے میں با اختیار ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The Prime minister said that the Parliament holds power to make all decisions.
Turk_Translation_2: Prime minister said that Parliament is sovereign to make decisions.
Turk_Translation_3: The Prime Minister said that the Parliament has the complete right to take any decision.
Turk_Translation_4: Prime minister said parliament has all rights for making decisions.

Urdu: ایک اور سوال کے جواب میں اُنہوں نے کہا کہ سابق صدر جنرل ریٹائرڈ پرویز مشرف سے آرمی چیف کا عہدہ چھوڑنے کے حوالے سے سیاسی جماعتوں کے کردار کے علاوہ سابق وزیر اعظم اور پاکستان پیپلز پارٹی کی چیئرپرسن بینظیر بھٹو کا بھی اہم کردار ہے جنہوں نے عالمی برادری پر زور دیا کہ وہ سابق صدر پرویز مشرف پر یونیفارم اُتارنے کے لیے زور دیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: In answer to another question the ex president Rtd General Pervaiz Musharaaf , was asked to leave his post in the army by alot of party leaders and Bae Nazir Bhutto herself as well.
Turk_Translation_2: while answering another question he said that Benazir along with other political forces had also played a role in forcing Musharraf to step down as Army chief. She convinced the International community about Gen. Musharraf's shedding of military uniform.
Turk_Translation_3: In answer to another question, he said that in getting the former President retired General Pervez Musharraf to leave his post, apart from the role of political parties, the former Prime Minister and Chairperson of the Pakistan Peoples Party, Benazir Bhutto also played an important role, by forcing the global brotherhood to remove the uniform of President Pervez Musharraf.
Turk_Translation_4: In one of his answers he also said that leader retired General Parwez Musharraf has been asked to quit the position of army prime minister and Pakistani chair person Benazzir Bhutto have also their roles very important who gave emphasis on universal brotherhood and also emphasized on leader parwez Musharraf to remove his uniform

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ منتخب امریکی نائب صدر جو بائیڈن پاکستان اور جمہوریت کے حامی ہیں اور اُن کی خدمات کے صلے میں صدر پاکستان نے اُنہیں ہلالِ پاکستان کا اعزاز دیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that the elected vice president of America Joe Haiden is a supported of Pakistan and democracy and in recognition of his services he was given the Hilale Pakistan by the President.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that vice president of America Joseph Byden are supporter of democracy in Pakistan. That is why he is awarded sitars imtiaz.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that the elected Vice President of America, Joe Biden was a supporter of Pakistan and democracy, and that the president honored him in return for his services with the Pakistani Crescent.
Turk_Translation_4: He also said that American leader Jobatin is in favor of pakistan and south and for his services leader of pakistan has titled him with honor.

Urdu: ممبئی واقعہ کے بعد بھارتی حکومت کی طرف سے پاکستان کے ساتھ ہر قسم کے تعلقات منقطع کرنے کی دھمکی کے بارے میں ایک سوال کے جواب میں یوسف رضا گیلانی نے کہا کہ بھارتی حکمرانوں کو اس وقت عوام کا شدید دباؤ ہے جس کی وجہ سے وہ ایسے بیانات دیتے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: After the Mumbai incident in response to the threat of eliminating all contacts by the Indian government the Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani said that the Indian government is giving such statements under the extreme pressure of the Indian people.
Turk_Translation_2: When asked about the Indian threat to cut off any relations with Pakistan, PM said that this statement was given under the intense public pressure.
Turk_Translation_3: Replying to a question about the Indian governments warning of breaking all ties with Pakistan, after the Mumbai incident, the Prime Minister Yusuf Raza Geelani said that the leaders are under extreme pressure from the public, which is why they issue such statements.
Turk_Translation_4: After Mumubai attack every kind of relationship between India and Pakistan will be broken regarding this answering a question Yussof Raza lihalini told Indian government are under pressure hence they give this type of warnings

Urdu: صحافیوں کی برطرفی کے خلاف احتجاج
Turk_Translation_1: Protest against the siding of Journalists.
Turk_Translation_2: Protest against the removal of journalists
Turk_Translation_3: Protest against the removal of journalists
Turk_Translation_4: The dismissal of journalists was protested.

Urdu: منگل کے روز اسلام آباد کے صحافیوں کی تنظم ’آر آئی یو جے‘  کے زیر اہتمام  اسلام آباد پریس کلب کے سامنے صحافیوں اور اخباری کارکنوں نے ٹی وی چینلز اور اخبارات سے ملازمین کی ایک بڑی تعداد کی  برطرفیوں پر ذرائع ابلاغ  کے مالکان اور حکومت کے احتجاج کیا اور نعرے بازی کی۔
Turk_Translation_1: I refuse to accept the cynical notion that nation after nation must spiral down a militaristic stairway in to the hall of thermonuclear destruction. I believed that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality.
Turk_Translation_2: On Tuesday the organization of journalists, RIUJ held protests in front of the Islamabad Press Club of journalists and newspaper workers against media owners and the government about the news channel and newspapers removing many of their employees.
Turk_Translation_3: Many of print and electronic media journalists held protest demonstration under the backing of RIUJ against the downsizing in different media organizations. They were shouting slogans against media owners and government
Turk_Translation_4: On Tuesday, the journalists in Islamabad went on a protest in front of the press club. Newspaper workers, journalists of TV channels, and the employees of newspapers and large number of the media owners raised the protest slogans.

Urdu: مظاہرین سے خطاب کرتے ہوئے صحافیوں کی سب سے بڑی تنظیم پاکستان فیڈرل یونین آف جرنلسٹ  کے سینئر رکن سی آر شمسی نے کہا کہ کل تک جو سیاست دان  ہمارے ساتھ  سٹرکوں پر احتجاج کرتے تھے آج  وہ ہی حکمران بن کر ایوان میں بیٹھے ہیں لیکن اخباری مالکان کے ایک مخصوص ٹولے کے خوف کی وجہ سے صحافیوں کے حقوق کے لیے کچھ نہیں کر رہے ہیں
Turk_Translation_1: I believe that even amid today's mortar bursts and whining bullets, there is still hop for a brighter tomorrow. I believe that wounded justice, lying prostrate on the blood flowing streets of our nation can be lifted from this dust of shame or reign supreme among the children of men.
Turk_Translation_2: Speaking to the protesters, senior member of Pakistan's biggest journalist organization, Federal Union of Journalists, C.R. Shamsi said that the politicians who used to protest with us till yesterday on the streets, today they have become rulers and are sitting in the parliament. Fearing a certain lobby of the media owners, they are not doing anything for the rights of the journalists.
Turk_Translation_3: CR Shamsi, a senior member RIUJ, addressed the gathering. He said the same politicians who were protesting on roads with us, now are ruling this country. They have not enough courage to take actions against some power media owners
Turk_Translation_4: Addressing the protestors, the journalists of big newspapers in Federal Union of Journalists of Pakistan and senior members said that the politicians were protested today. The newspaper owners of small group were holding due to the fear on the rights of journalists.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ انسانی حقوق کی بات کرنے والے اخباری مالکان نے اپنے اداروں کو عقوبت خانے اور بیگار کیمپ  بنا رکھا ہے جہاں اربوں روپے سالانہ کمانے کے باوجود کارکنوں کو انتہائی کم اجرتیں اور  سینکٹروں کو برطرف کر کے ان کا معاشی قتل کیا جا رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: I have the audacity to believe the people everywhere can have three meals a day for their bodies, education and culture for their minds, and dignity, equality and freedom for their spirits.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that the newspaper owners who speak of human rights have made their offices punishment houses and beggar camps, where despite earning millions of Rupees per year, the workers are given meager wages and by removing hundreds of them, they are killing them economically.
Turk_Translation_3: He said how the owners of media groups talked about human rights; they are exploiting the poor journalists by killing them financially.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that the Human Rights to the newspaper owners should be given to these organizations. The punishment and impressment camp of workers may lead to loss of billions of rupees in spite of the annual profits.

Urdu: اس کی مثال لاہور کے  ایک  نجی ٹی وی چینل فائیو کے ایک کارکن کی ہمارے سامنے ہے جس نے چار ماہ سے تنخواہ نہ ملنے پر خودکشی کر لی تھی اور آج بھی بہت سے کارکن جبری  برطرفیوں اور مہینوں تنخِواہ نہ ملنے کے سبب پریشانی کی زندگی گزار رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: This faith can give us courage to face the uncertainties of the future. It will gives our tired feet new strength as we continue our forward stride toward the city of freedom.
Turk_Translation_2: An example of this is in front of us of the worker of a private TV channel, Channel 5, in Lahore, who committed suicide over not getting his salary for four months. And even today, due to being unfairly removed or not getting salaries for months, many workers are leading very difficult lives.
Turk_Translation_3: One example of the exploitation is the suicide of a reporter of Lahore based Private TV channel. He was not having his due salary for four months. The media workers are living hand to mouth under the constant stress of downsizing and under payment.
Turk_Translation_4: The example of this is that channel five, a private TV at Lahore. A member commited suicide for not recieving salary and many workers today also forced over non-payment of salaries for months because of which they are spending their lives with tension.

Urdu: انھوں نے کہا کہ ٹی وی اور اخباری مالکان کے خلاف راست اقدام ہونا چاہیے اور صحافیوں کے حقوق کے لیے پارلیمان کے سامنے ایک مستقل احتجاجی کیمپ لگانے کی ضرورت ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: When our days become dreary with low-hovering clouds and our nights and become darker than a thousands midnights, we will know that we are living in the creative turmoil of a genuine civilization.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that there should be firm steps taken against the TV and newspaper owners, and the journalists should put a protest camp in front of the parliament to get their rights.
Turk_Translation_3: He supported a decisive action against media owners. A camp should be installed before the National assembly to show anger and protest.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that the TV and newspaper owners went on a permanent protest in front of parliament saying that steps should be taken for the rights of journalists.

Urdu: سی آر شمسی نے گورنر پنجاب سلمان تاثیر کو تنقید کا نشانہ بناتے ہوئے کہا کہ ان کے اردو اخبار ’ آج کل‘ سے ملازمین کو بغیر کسی نوٹس کے بر طرف کیا جا رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: With the richness and variety of bird life is exiting discoveries of a similar kind are awaiting to be made by any bird watcher who has the requisite enthusiasm and perseverance.
Turk_Translation_2: C.R. Shamsi criticized the governor of Punjab, Salman Taseer, saying that employees were removed from his Urdu Newspaper 'Aaj Kal' staff, without prior notice.
Turk_Translation_3: CR Shamsi criticized Salman taseer and blamed that Govers newspaper aaj Kaal is sacking its employees without any prior notice.
Turk_Translation_4: Salman, the governor of Punjab and solar energy criticised to an Urdu newspaper Today about the employees not given any notice.

Urdu: جبکہ روزنامہ جناح، روزنامہ خبریں، چینل فائیو،  بزنس پلس ٹی وی اور آج ٹی وی نے بھی درجنوں ملازمین کو برطرف کیا ہے
Turk_Translation_1: In actual fact there is little danger from and elephant unless it happens to be a rogue or a female with a small calf.
Turk_Translation_2: Wheras Junah daily, Khabrein daily, Channel 5, Burns Plus TV and Aaj TV have removed dozens of workers.
Turk_Translation_3: Daily Jinnah, daily khabrain, Channel 5, business plus and Aaj news have sacked dozens of their employees.
Turk_Translation_4: Dozens of employees were also dismissed at The daily Jinnah, Daily News Channel, Plus Five, Business TV and TV today.

Urdu: پی یو ایف جے کے سیکرٹری جنرل مظہر عباس نے مظاہرین سے خطاب کرتے ہوئے کہا کہ آج ملک بھر میں صحافتی تنظیمیں صحافیوں اور اخباری کارکنوں کی برطرفیوں کے خلاف یوم سیاہ منا رہی ہیں جبکہ صحافی اپنے حقوق کے حصول کے لیے  پارلیمان کے سیشن میں بازوں پر سیاہ پٹیاں باندھ کر جائیں گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: I still believe that one day mankind will bow before the altars of god and be crowned triumphant over war and bloodshed,and non-violent redemptive would will be proclaimed the rule of the land the lion and the lamb shall lie down together and every man shall sit under his own vine.
Turk_Translation_2: Speaking to the protestors, the General Secretary of PUFJ said that today, throughout the country, journalist organizations are observing a black day against the removal of journalists and newspaper workers, whereas journalists will go to the parliamentary session wearing black bands on their arms to get back their rights.
Turk_Translation_3: Mazhar Abbas, General Secretary RIUJ, also addressed. He said that all journalists associations are observing black day today to protest anganist forced abdications of journalists. He said that journalists will cover the parliaments session with black strips to protest.
Turk_Translation_4: The BJP and the secretary general of the demonstrators Mazhar Abbas said while addressing to the country today that his journalist organizations and journalists of the newspaper tied black bandages on their arms claiming the rights of journalists.

Urdu: مظہر عباس کے مطابق پاکستان کے پچاسی فیصد اخبارات اور ٹی وی چینلز میں کارکنوں اور صحافیوں کا استحصال کیا جا رہے جہاں وہ  بغیر کسی معاہدے   کے کام کر رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: I was also asked how I could subsist on the little food I ate during my meals,and this knowledge again was obtained by watching me eat till i mustered enough courage to shut the kitchen door.
Turk_Translation_2: According to Mazhar Abbas, in 50% of the Pakistani newspapers and TV channels the workers and journalists were being exploited, where they work without any agreement.
Turk_Translation_3: Mazhar Abbas said that 50% TV channels and newspapers of Pakistan are exploiting media workers. Journalists are working there without any formal agreement
Turk_Translation_4: According to the Pakistan Mazhar Abbas 85 percent of workers at newspapers and TV channels are being exploited without any agreement at the place where he is working.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ اب تک دو سو سے زائد صحافیوں اور کارکنوں کو اخبارات اور ٹی وی چینلز سے نکالا جا رہا ہے جبکہ خدشہ ہے کہ رواں سال مالکان معاشی بحران کو جواز بنا کر مزید سینکڑوں کارکنوں کو برطرف کر دیں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The villages were curious about me, and strange as it may seem, I had not anticipated it. It usually showed itself in their asking me direct question.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that till now, more than 200 journalists and workers have been removed from newspapers and TV channels, while it is being feared that the owners will remove hundreds more in the present year, making an excuse of the present financial crisis.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that more than 200 journalists and media workers are being sacked from TV channels and newspapers. More workers can be sacked by using economic crisis as a possible reason.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that so far, more than 200 journalists and workers at newspapers and TV channels are being removed in the current year by the owners and feared that hundreds of more workers may be dismissed because of the economic crisis.

Urdu: مظہر عباس نےکہا کے صحافیوں کی تحریک اس وقت تک جاری رہے گی جب تک برطرف کیےگئے ملازمین کو بحال نہیں کیا جاتا، اخباری کارکنوں کی اجرتوں کا  تعین کرنے والے ساتویں ویج بورڈ ایوارڈ کا نفاذ اور ٹی وی چینلز، اخبارات کے ملازمین کی  کئی کئی ماہ سے روکی گئی تنخواہوں کی ادائیگی نہیں ہوتی ہے۔

Although Indian government is continuously pressurizing Pakistan to hand over anyone involved in this matter to India.
Turk_Translation_2: The High Commissione of Pakistan in India, Shahid Malik, met President Asif Ali Zardari, in which meeting the president made it clear that if any Pakistani group or individual is found guilty in the Mumbai attacks, action will be taaken against them according to the country law, and no one would be handed over to India. This, when the Indian government is continuously pressuring Pakistan to hand over the guilty people to India.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistani High commissioner in India Shahid Malik has met president Asif Ali Zardari in which it was cleared that if any person or group from Pakistan is found involved in Mumbai attacks, he will be dealt in accordance with the national laws and no one will be handed over to India. whereas the Indian leadership is putting pressure on Pakistan to extradite the people involved in the incident to India.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan's High Commissioner Shahid Malik met the President Asif Ali Zardari and has clarified that if any Pakistani individual or group was found to be involved in attacks of Mumbai then action will be taken in India and Pakistan.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ مارٹن لوتھر کنگ نے اپنی زیادہ لوگوں کی خدمت میں گزاری۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that Martin Luther King spent most of his for the people.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that Martin Luther King spent his life to serve the people.
Turk_Translation_3: He has also said that King Martin Luther had spent most of his life by serving the nation and its people.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that Martin Luther King has spent his life in serving people.

Urdu: باراک اوباما کا کہنا تھا کہ ’آج جب ہم ان کی یاد کا احترام کر رہے ہیں تو یہ ایسا دن نہیں کہ ہم ٹھہر جائیں اور سوچیں۔ یہ ایسا دن ہے کہ ہم عمل کریں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Barack Obama said: "Today, we are remembering and respecting him, so it is not a day for us to stop and think. It is a day for us to act".
Turk_Translation_2: Barrack Obama said today we are honoring the memories of him. This is not the day to just pause and think. It is the day to act.
Turk_Translation_3: Barack Obama was also saying that when we are respecting the memories of King Martin Luther then we should not just stand in his respect instead adopt his sayings in our practice.
Turk_Translation_4: Barack Obama said that today when we are remembering him, this is not the day to stay and think. It is the day to act.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ منگل کی تقریب اسی راہ پر ہوگی جس پر کئی ہزار افراد مارٹن لوتھر کنگ کا ’میرا اک خواب ہے‘ سننے کے لیے سنہ انیس سو تریسٹھ میں جمع ہوئے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that the ceremony on Tuesday would be on the same path as that of Martin Luther King's 'My Dream' speech, to hear which many thousands of people gathered, in 1963.
Turk_Translation_2: He said on the oath taking ceremony on Tuesday will have the same spirit as it was in 1963, when many people gathered to hear the "I've a dream" of Martin Luther King.
Turk_Translation_3: He has said that the Tuesday's function in which thousands of people gathered to hear the dream of King Martin Luther. People heard my speech which who were also gathered to hear the same dream in the year 1970.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that Tuesday's ceremony will be held on the same place where thousands of people gathered for Martin Luther King's 'I have a dream' in 1963.

Urdu: اس تقریر میں مارٹن لوتھر کنگ نے کہا تھا کہ وہ دن آئے گا جب لوگوں سے ان کے رنگ کو دیکھتے ہوئے امتیاز نہیں برتا جائے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: In this speech, Martin Luther King said that the day will come when people would not be preferentially treated based on their color.
Turk_Translation_2: During that speech Martin Luthar king said that a day will come when no discrimination will be made on the basis of one's skin color.
Turk_Translation_3: King Martin Luther has also said in the same function that " that day would come when people would take inspiration from his color.
Turk_Translation_4: In this speech Martin Luther King said that the day will come when people will not be differentiated on the base of their color.

Urdu: بی بی سی کے میتھیو پرائس کہتے ہیں کہ تاریخ کی ستم ظریفی کہیئے کہ  یومِ مارٹن لوتھر اس دن سے چوبیس گھنٹے قبل آیا ہے جب امریکی تاریخ کے پہلے سیاہ فام صدر اپنے عہدے کا حلف اٹھائیں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: BBC's Mathew Price said that you can call it the patching up of history, that Martin Luther King Day came twenty four hours before the first black president in American history would take the oath of office.
Turk_Translation_2: It is a strange historical coincidence that Martin Luther King Day should fall the day before when first black president of US will take his oath, said by BBC's Matthew Price.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the BBC's reporter Mathew Pres in the history of the American oath taking ceremony, the King Martin Luther has come for the oath taking ceremony before 24 hours while the other American leaders would take the oath on the blue form.
Turk_Translation_4: Mathew Price of BBC says that it is the tragedy of history that the day of Martin Luther is 24 hours earlier then the day when first black President of America will sworn in.

Urdu: امریکہ کی جنوبی ریاستوں میں بہت سے لوگوں کے لیے باراک اوباما کی صدارت، ڈاکٹر لوتھر کنگ کے خواب کی تعبیر ہوگی۔
Turk_Translation_1: In many of the southern states of America, Barack Obama's presidency is the interpretation of Dr. Martin Luther King's dream.
Turk_Translation_2: For many in the southern states, Barack Obama's presidency will be a realization of Dr Luther King's dream
Turk_Translation_3: The leadership of Obama in the various states of South America would prove to be the implementation of the dream of the King Martin Luther.
Turk_Translation_4: For many in southern states of America the Presidency of Barack Obama, will be the interpretation of Martin Luther King's dream.

Urdu: گیارہ جنوری دو ہزار نو کو جنوبی وزیرستان کے قبائلی علاقے کارکنڑہ میں سات مسلح نقاب پوشوں نے ایڈیشنل پولیٹکل ایجنٹ عامر لطیف کو ڈرائیور سمیت اغواء کیاتھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: On the 11th of January, 2009, seven masked men kidnapped the additional political agent, Aamir Latheef, along with his driver, from the tribal area, Karkandah of South Waziristan.
Turk_Translation_2: On 11th January 2009, Additional Political agent Aamir Latif and his driver were kidnapped by 7 veiled gun men in the tribal area of South Waziristan.
Turk_Translation_3: On the eleventh of January 2009 in the tribal locality of Karkandra seven armed masked men had kidnapped the Additional Political Agent Aamir Lateef along with his driver.
Turk_Translation_4: On 11th January 2009 in South Uzbekistan Kahlbi region seven masked people kidnapped additional political agent with driver

Urdu: سرکاری اہلکار کے مطابق اغواء کاروں نے پہلے گاڑی میں موجود محافظوں کو غیر مسلح کیا تھا اور اس کے بعد ایڈیشنل پولیٹکل ایجنٹ کو ایک گاڑی میں بٹھا کر وہاں سے لے گئے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to the government agent, the kidnappers first disarmed the guards, and after that they seated the additional political agent in another car, and took him away from there.
Turk_Translation_2: According Govt. officials, kidnappers first disarmed the security guards of the political agents and then take him away from there.
Turk_Translation_3: Official members say that the kidnappers first unarmed the security available in the cars and then made the Additional Political Agent to sit in another car and took him away.
Turk_Translation_4: According to resources first the kidnappers inspected the vehicle and then additional agent was taken in a vehicle and taken away

Urdu: مقامی انتظامیہ کے مطابق ایڈیشنل پولیٹکل ایجنٹ کے اغوا کے بعد سکیورٹی فورسز نے جنوبی وزیرستان اور نیم قبائلی علاقوں میں تمام چیک پوسٹوں کی ناکہ بندی کر دی تھی اور آنے جانے والوں کی سخت تلاشی لی جا رہی تھی اور گزشتہ ایک ہفتے سے حکام نے وانا پر اقتصادی پابندی بھی لگادی تھی۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to the local government, after the kidnapping of the additional political agent, security forces guarded all the check posts in South Waziristan and semi-tribal areas, and the people coming and going were searched thoroughly, and from the previous one week, the rulers have placed economic restrictions on Wana.
Turk_Translation_2: According to Local administration, all the check posts in the area have been strengthened with more security forces. Travelers are scrutinized thoroughly. An economic sanction has been imposed on Wana for last week.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the Local Organization after the kidnap of the Additional Political Agent security forces blockaded all the check posts of the Southern Wazeerastan and the tribal area and every passerby was checked thoroughly and from about a week the officials had ordered economical restrictions on Wana.
Turk_Translation_4: Due to kidnap of additional political agent security forces put a checking at all check points in south Uzbekistan and neen khabili areas and checked all the vehicles passing from there and from past one week police has restricted the area

Urdu: آٹھ دسمبر دو ہزار اٹھ کو شمالی وزیرستان کے اسسٹینٹ پولیٹکل ایجنٹ عصمت اللہ کو بھی اس وقت اغوا کرلیا گیا تھا جب وہ عید کی چھٹیاں منانے کے لیے میرعلی سے بنوں جا رہے تھے۔ اور اس کے چند دن بعد شمالی وزیرستان میں تحصیلدار امان اللہ سمیت دو افراد کو نامعلوم نقاب پوشوں نے ہلاک کر دیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: on 8th of December 2008, Assistant political agent of north Wazirastan Asmatullah got kidnapped when he was going from Mir Ali to Bannu to enjoy his Eid vacations. Few days after this two people including Tehsildar Amanullah were killed by unknown maskers in north Wazirastan.
Turk_Translation_2: On the 8th of December, 2008, the Assistant Political Agent of North Waziristan was kidnapped when he was going to celebrate the Eid vacation from Meer Ali to Banoo, and a few days later, two people, including District Officer Amanullah were killed by unidentified masked men.
Turk_Translation_3: On the eight of December 2008, Northern Wazeerastan's Assistant Political Agent Asmattullah was kidnapped at that time when he was traveling from Meer Ali to Banu on Eid Vacation.
Turk_Translation_4: on 8th December 2008 southern Uzbekistan s assistant political agent Azmatullah was also kidnapped at the same time when he was going for festival from meer ali to banu after few days in southern uzhbekistan with tashildaar amaanullah two people were killed by masked people.

Urdu: جمعرات کو پاکستان کے معروف روزنامہ ’دی نیوز‘ نے پاکستان کے زیرانتظام کشمیر میں مقیم شدت پسند گروپوں کے بارے میں لکھا تھا کہ لشکر طیبہ اور حزب المجاہدین نے کشمیر پالیسی پر نظرثانی کا فیصلہ کرلیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: On Thursday, the renowned daily, 'The News' wrote about the extremist groups operating in Pakistan occupied Kashmir, that Lashkar-e-Taiba and Hizbul Mujahideen have decided to revise their Kashmir policy.

Urdu: کوئٹہ زیارت اور دیگر مصافاتی علاقوں میں تین روز سے گیس کی شدید قلت ہے جہاں ایک طرف برف باری کا سلسلہ جاری ہے اور درجہ حرارت نقطہ انجماد سے نیچے گر گیا ہے اور دوسری طرف ہیٹر اور چولہے ٹھنڈے پڑ گئے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Quetta: Zyarat and other surrounding areas have extreme shortage of natural gas for three days. Where on one side, the snowfall continues and the temperature has dropped below freezing, the other side is where the stoves and heaters are gone cold.

Turk_Translation_1: Law minister Punjab, Rana Sanaullah Khan says that assignment of a superintendent in the Jamat-ud-Dawa center came in to being so that the work of the welfare organizations present there is not disturbed.

Although according to them, there has also been an increase in the police staff.

Urdu: اقوام متحدہ کی سلامتی کونسل نے جماعت الدعوۃ پر پابندی عائد کی ہے جس کے بعد پاکستان کی وفاقی حکومت نے ملک بھر میں جماعتالدعوۃ کے خلاف کارروائی کی اور جماعت کے امیر حافظ سعید سمیت دیگر رہنماؤں کو نظر بند کردیا گیا ہے۔ حکومت پنجاب کی طرف سے مرکز طیبہ میں ایڈمنسٹر مقرر کرنا بھی وفاقی حکومت کی جانب سے جماعت الدعوہ کے خلاف کی جانے والی کارروائی کا تسلسل ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Security Council of the United Nations has placed restrictions on Jamat-ud-Dawa after which, Pakistan's federal government did operation against Jamat-ud-Dawa in the entire country. The appointment of the administrator in the Taibah center by the Punjab government was also a part of the action being taken against Jamaa'athud Da'wah by the joint government.

By the government of punjab, its in possible to declare an administrator in the Markazey-tuaiba and as per federalize government those who can go against jamat-al-qaeda proceeding to continue

Turk_Translation_1: Hafiz Khalid Waleed has informed that Lahore division commissioner Khusro Parvez Khan came to the Tayyaba Center on Sunday with the police and civil authority and inspected several parts of the center. And said that earlier operations of the government has already decreased the number of patients in the hospital and students in the school.

Khalid Waheed has disapproved the appointment of the administrator in the center of Jamaat al Dawa and said that due to the actions of the government, the number of patients in the hospitals and children in the schools of the center have already decreased.

Khalid Waleed spoke ill about the appointment of an administrator, by the government in Jamaa'athud Da'wah, and he said that the number of patients in the hospital and children in the school had already dropped due to government actions.

Urdu: ادھر جماعت الدعوۃ  کی ایک پریس ریلیز کے مطابق جماعت کے امیر حافظ سعید نے اقوام متحدہ کے جنرل سیکرٹری بان کی مون اور  کمیٹی برائے طالبان کے نام ایک خط لکھا ہے جس میں ان سے سلامتی کونسل کی طرف سے جماعت پر عائد کی جانے والی  پابندی ختم کرنے کی اپیل کی گئی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to a press release by Jama'athu Da'wah, here, the Jama'ath chief, Hafiz Saeed is said to have written a letter to the United Nations General Secretary, Ban Ki Moon, and the Committee on Taliban, appealing to remove the ban on Jama'athud Da'wah, passed by the Security Council.
Turk_Translation_2: Here, according to one press release of the council party, the council's prince Hafiz Saeed has written a letter to to the United Nations General Secretary Ban Ki Mon and to members of the committee he asked to end the regularity made on the council by the peace convention.
Turk_Translation_3: Here according to a press release by Jamat-ud-Dawa, party's chief Hafiz Saeed has written a letter for the General Secretary of United Nations, Ban Ki Mon, and Committee for Taliban, in a reques is made to cancel the restrictions on the party made by the Security Council.
Turk_Translation_4: As per the jamat alqaeda ,according to one of press release that the head of the jamat hafez saeed has written a letter to the seceratory general of Aqwam-me-mutahda Ban-ki-mon and the commitee of taliban in that he had appealed to remove the sanctions by the safety counsil

Urdu: خط میں یہ کہا گیا  کہ سلامتی کونسل کی طرف سے جماعت الدعوۃ پر پابندی کا یکطرفہ فیصلہ ناانصافی ہے اور جماعت الدعوۃ کا دہشت گردی سے کوئی تعلق نہیں بلکہ یہ رفاہی کاموں میں مصروف  ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In the letter, he mentioned that the passing of the ban by the Security Council on Jama'athud Da'wah, was a one-sided and unjust decision, and that Jama'athud Da'wah has no connection with terrorism, and rather is busy in social work.

Turk_Translation_3: It says in the letter that the one sided decision of the Security Council on banning Jamat-ud-Dawa is unfair. And Jamat-ud-Dawa has no relation with terrorism but it is busy in the activities of charity.
Turk_Translation_4: In that letter he told that the decision taken by the safety counsil is one sided decision and which is unfair and jamat al qaeda has no links with the terrorism but they are involved with their charitable cause.
