Urdu: کیا ان سیاسی واقعات کا کھیلوں پر اثر پڑنا چاہیے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Should these political events affect sports.
Turk_Translation_2: should these political instances affect over the sports?
Turk_Translation_3: Should sports be effected due to these political events?
Turk_Translation_4: Should these political incidents affect sports?

Urdu: آپ پاکستان اور ہندستان کے تعلقات کا مستقبل کیا دیکھتےہیں؟
Turk_Translation_1: What do you see the future of Indo-Pak relations looking like?
Turk_Translation_2: what do you see as the future of Pakistan and India relations.
Turk_Translation_3: What future to you see of India Pakistan Relationship?
Turk_Translation_4: How do you see the future of Pakistan and India relations?

Urdu: پاکستان کو نہ امريکہ توڑے گا نہ انڈيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Neither America nor India will break Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Neither America will break Pakistan nor India.
Turk_Translation_3: Neither America, nor India would break Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan will not be torn apart by America or India.

Urdu: پاکستان کو خود پاکستانی توڑيں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan will break itself.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan will be broken by Pakistanis themselves.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan would be broken by the Pakistanis themselves.
Turk_Translation_4: It will be torn apart by Pakistani themselves.

Urdu: اتنی صوبائيت فرقہ واريت اور ملائيت کے بعد آپ کيا توقع رکھتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: With so much regionalism, factionism and infiltration, what else can you expect?
Turk_Translation_2: what do you expect after so much provincialism, sectarianism, and Mullaism.
Turk_Translation_3: What do you expect after such regionalism, communalism and vandalism.
Turk_Translation_4: What can you expect after so much internal segregation and rivalry?

Urdu: ويسے جناح نے بھی انڈيا کے مسلمانوں کے ساتھ اچھا نہيں کيا يہ وقت ثابت کر چکا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Time has proved that Jinnah did not do good to the Indian Muslims.
Turk_Translation_2: although Jinnah also did not do good to the Muslims of India and it has been proven with time.
Turk_Translation_3: Even Jinnah too did not do good towards the Muslim's of India. Time has proved this.
Turk_Translation_4: However, Jinnah didn't do well with the Muslims from India, and time has already proven that.

Urdu: yasmin، شکاگو
Turk_Translation_1: Yasmin, Chicago
Turk_Translation_2: Yasmin, Chicago.
Turk_Translation_3: Yasmin, Chicago
Turk_Translation_4: Yasmin: Chicago.

Urdu: محترمہ اگر جناح صاحب کے وژن پر کام جاری رہتا تو نہ صوبائیت،فرقاواریت اور ملائیت کا کینسر پاکستان میں پھیلتا اور نہ ہی بھارت میں مسلمانوں کے ساتھ ایسا برتاؤ ہوتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Madam, if work was continued in Jinnah's manner, neither would the tumors of regionalism, factionism and infiltration have spread in Pakistan, nor would the Indian Muslims been treated in this way.
Turk_Translation_2: Madam, if Mr. Jinnah's vision was followed, neither the cancer of provincialism, sectarianism, and Mullaism had spread in Pakistan nor the Muslims in India had undergone such behavior.
Turk_Translation_3: Madam, if we kep working on the vision of Jinnah, the cancer of Communalism, Regionalism and Vandalism would not have spread in Pakistan. And also the Muslims of India would not have been treated this way.
Turk_Translation_4: Madam, if Jinnah's work was carried forward, then these internal cancer of segregation and rivalry would not have spread, and the muslims in India wouldn't be in the situation they are in now.

Urdu: مگر غلطی ہماری ہے کہ ان جیسے قد کا کوئی لیڈر پیدا نہیں کر سکے۔
Turk_Translation_1: But it is our fault that we couldnt reproduce a leader of similar stature.
Turk_Translation_2: but it's our fault that we could not bring up a leader like his stature.
Turk_Translation_3: It is our mistake of not producing a leader of his caliber
Turk_Translation_4: It's our fault that after him, no other leader could stand in his shoes.

Urdu: ہم اگر اپنے ہیروز کی قدر نہیں کر سکتے تو
Turk_Translation_1: If we can't respect our leaders then
Turk_Translation_2: if we can not care for our heroes, then
Turk_Translation_3: If we could pay the due respect to our heroes
Turk_Translation_4: But if we can't appreciate our heroes, then....

Urdu: اس خطہ ميں صلاحيتيں تو بہت ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: There are many able people in this part of the world.
Turk_Translation_2: this region has great capabilities.
Turk_Translation_3: This region has great potential.
Turk_Translation_4: This sector does have a lot of abilities.

Urdu: خدا جانے کب عقل آئے گی اور اتفاق کی برکت سے يہ خطہ ترقی کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: God knows when some sense will return to the people and when the blessing of consensus in opinion will help develop this area.
Turk_Translation_2: god knows when we'll understand and the region will progress with the blessing of unity.
Turk_Translation_3: God knows when this region will learn its lesson and its unity will bring regional development/prosperity.
Turk_Translation_4: God knows when they will come to their senses and use the blessing of unity to make some progress.

Urdu: دونوں ملکوں ميں ملا، پنڈت، طالبان، شيو سينا، آر ايس ايس وغيرہ تو امن کے مخالف تيار کیے گئے ہيں ہي۔
Turk_Translation_1: In both countries the Mullahs, Pundits, Taliban, Shiv Sena and the RSS etc have been established to oppose the peace process.
Turk_Translation_2: in both countries the enemies to peace like Mullas, Pandits, Taliban, Shiv sena, RSS have been raised.
Turk_Translation_3: Both countries have extremist forces like Taliban, Shiv sina and RSS etc... These extremist forces are enemies of the regional peace.
Turk_Translation_4: Both countries have priests, Shiv sena, RSS etc. that constantly oppose peace.

Urdu: اور دجالی قوتيں نہيں چاہتی کہ يہ خطہ امن کے ساتھ ترقی کرے چنانچہ ان ملکوں کو پتلی ناچ نچايا جا رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And destructive forces don't want this area to develop and for this these countries are manipulated like puppets.
Turk_Translation_2: and the evil powers don't want this region to progress therefore these countries are controlled like puppets.
Turk_Translation_3: The imperial powers do not want peace and stability in this region.They are controlling these countries like puppets.
Turk_Translation_4: And these negative forces do not want the sector to make any progress, hence the countries are kept on their toes.

Urdu: کيا آپ تصور کر سکتے ہيں کہ اتفاق کے ساتھ اس علاقہ پاکستان بھارت اور چین کا دنيا ميں کيا مقام ہوگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Can you imagine with the aid of consensus between Pakistan, India and China what position they would have in the world.
Turk_Translation_2: can you imagine what status will this region of Pakistan, India and China will have in the world.
Turk_Translation_3: can you imagine the international influence of Pakistan, China and India, if they are united
Turk_Translation_4: Can you imagine the status of this place in the world for Pakistan, India and China, with just a little bit of unity?

Urdu: پاکستان پر تو خدا کا عذاب ہے جو چوروں ڈاکوؤں اور رسہ گيروں کو بصورت ليڈر قوم پر مسلط کر ديا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: It is Gods punishment who has positioned thieves, robbers and manipulators as leaders of this country.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan is under persecution from God that these thieves, bandits and criminals have been imposed as leaders of the nation.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan is under the occupation of corrupt and opportunist leadership.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan is cursed by God for having robbers and thieves as their appointed leaders.

Urdu: اللہ کرے ہمارے ملک پاکستان پر کبھی بھی کوئی آنچ نہ آئے، آمين۔
Turk_Translation_1: May God safe guard Pakistan from any harm, Amen.
Turk_Translation_2: may Allah protect our country from any harm, Amen.
Turk_Translation_3: May God protect our country, Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: May God our country Pakistan always be safed, ameen.

Urdu: مگر صاحب ذرا آنکھيں کھول کر اپنے ارد گرد کے حالات اور زمينی حقائق کو ديکھيں تو آپ کو نظر آجائے گا کہ امريکی افواج کہاں تک پہنچ گئی ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: But sir open your eyes and look around and see the current situation and ground realities that reveal the extent to which the American have progressed.
Turk_Translation_2: but Sir, open your eyes to see the surrounding situation and ground reality, you will figure out how far American forces have penetrated.
Turk_Translation_3: But being a Pakistani we should not neglect the ground realities/threats. American forces have been deployed very near to our afghan borders.
Turk_Translation_4: But,please open your eyes to look at the situation and ground realities around you then you will come to know that where American troops have reached .

Urdu: اسکے علاوہ ملکی معاملات بھی درست نظر نہيں آرہے ہيں، سرحد، بلوچستان اور سندھ ميں کراچی کے حالات بھی آپ کے سامنے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: moreover, the internal affairs don't seem to be good, as you can see the circumstances in NWFP, Balochistan and in Karachi in Sindh.
Turk_Translation_2: Other than that National matter are not looking good as well, circumstances in Sarhad, Balochistan, Karachi in Sindh are in front of you.
Turk_Translation_3: Besides this the situation in the country doesnt seem to be stable, like in the NWFP, Baluchistan and Sindh, and the problems in Karachi are also evident.
Turk_Translation_4: Besides the country matters do not seems better.The circumstances in NWFP, Baluchistan,and the situation of Karachi in Sindh, are also in front of you .

Urdu: ايسی صورتحال ميں ملک کو ايک ايسے ليڈر کی ضرورت ہے جو ہميں ايک متحد قوم بنا سکے۔
Turk_Translation_1: in this situation the country needs such a leader who can unite us as one nation.
Turk_Translation_2: In this situation country needs a such leader who can unite us as a single Nation.
Turk_Translation_3: In this atmosphere we need a leader that can unite the people of this country.
Turk_Translation_4: In this situation the country needs that leader who can make us a united nation.

Urdu: يا اللہ ہم پہ رحم فرما۔
Turk_Translation_1: O Allah bestow your mercy upon us.
Turk_Translation_2: O Allah Have mercy on us
Turk_Translation_3: O God please show us some mercy.
Turk_Translation_4: May God mercy upon us.

Urdu: ميرے خيال سے ايک آخری جنگ کے بغير کوئی چارہ نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Account to my understanding, a final war is inevitable.
Turk_Translation_2: In my opinion there is no way other than a last war.
Turk_Translation_3: I believe we have no other option but to go to war one last time.
Turk_Translation_4: I think a last war is the only option.

Urdu: بس بہت ہو چکا۔
Turk_Translation_1: this is enough of it.
Turk_Translation_2: Enough much has happened
Turk_Translation_3: Enough is enough.
Turk_Translation_4: That's it, enough is enough.

Urdu: اب معاملہ آر يا پار ہو ہی جانا چاہيے۔
Turk_Translation_1: now it should be do or die.
Turk_Translation_2: Now this affair has to win or lose.
Turk_Translation_3: It's now or never.
Turk_Translation_4: This situation is "now or never".

Urdu: يہ مذاکرات کے منافقانہ ڈھونگوں سے مسئلہ حل نہيں ہو گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: this problem can not be solved through these acts of insincere dialogues.
Turk_Translation_2: This problem will not solve with hypocrisy deceit.
Turk_Translation_3: These fraudulent dialogues and pointless meetings are not the solution to the problems.
Turk_Translation_4: These false acts of cooperation will not solve the problem.

Urdu: نہ ہی ايک دوسرے کے ملکوں ميں چھوٹی موٹی دہشت گرديوں سے۔
Turk_Translation_1: and not through small scale terrorism in each other's country.
Turk_Translation_2: And neither with small big terrorism in each other countries.
Turk_Translation_3: Neither is by committing small scale terrorist acts in each others territories.
Turk_Translation_4: Nor will small terrorist attacks in each others countries.

Urdu: آخر يورپ کو بھی تو آخری عظيم جنگ لڑنے کے بعد ہی قرار آيا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: after all, Europe got settled after the final world war.
Turk_Translation_2: Even Europe too came to rest after fighting the last great war.
Turk_Translation_3: After all it was only after waging the Second World War that Europe managed to sort its problems out.
Turk_Translation_4: Afterall, even Europe was founded after the last world war.

Urdu: اور يہ جنگ عظيم نہ ہوئی ہوتی تو يہ سب بھی آج تک پاکستان اور بھارت کی طرح چخ چخ ہی کر رہے ہوتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: and if this world war had not taken place, then these countries, just like Pakistan and India, would have been clattering.
Turk_Translation_2: And if this Great war had not happened then they all would be chattering like Pakistan and India.
Turk_Translation_3: And if it wasn't for this World War then they'd still be arguing and nagging each other over small things.
Turk_Translation_4: And if there had not been a great war, then they would still be fighting back and forth like Pakistan and India.

Urdu: ہماری تقريباً ساری سياسی جماعتيں اس بات پر اتفاق کرتيں ہيں کہ ملک سے دہشتگردی اور فرقہ واريت کا خاتمہ ہونا چاہيے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Almost all of our political parties agree on this matter that these terrorist and denominational activities should be terminated from the country.
Turk_Translation_2: Almost all our political parties agree that terrorism and factionalism should be finished.
Turk_Translation_3: Almost all of our political parties are unified to the topic that terrorism and sectarian violence shall be eradicated from the country.
Turk_Translation_4: Almost all of our political parties are agreed on the fact that terrorism and sectarianism should be rooted out of the country.

Urdu: ليکن ہماری فوجی قيادت اس کام ميں مخلص نظر نہيں آتی، ايک طرف تو امريکہ اور يورپ کو يقين دہانی کرائی جاتی ہے کہ دہشتگردی کی اس جنگ ميں ہم آپ کے ساتھ ہيں دوسری طرف طالبان کی بھی خفيہ طور پر مدد کرتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: But our army rule does not seem sincere in this matter. On one hand, American and Europe are made to believe that we are with you on this war against terrorism and the other hand, we also help Taliban secretly.
Turk_Translation_2: But our military leadership does not seem to be sincere in these regards. On the one hand, America and Europe are ascertained that we are with them in their war against terrorism, and on the other hand we secretly help the Taiban.
Turk_Translation_3: But own military leadership does not seem to be sincere on this topic. At one side Europe and America are assured that the military is sincere in achieving a terror free state but on the other hand helps the Taliban in disguise.
Turk_Translation_4: But our military leadership does not seem sincere in this regard. On one hand they assure America and Europe that they are with them in this war against terror and on the other hand are covertly aiding the Taliban.

Urdu: ہميں اب سوچنا ہے اور اپنی سمت کا تعين کرنا اور صرف ايک کی راہ کا انتخاب کرنا ہے، شکريہ
Turk_Translation_1: We have to think now and decide our direction and only choose one way. Thank you.
Turk_Translation_2: We should think and fix our direction and choose only one way. Thanks.
Turk_Translation_3: Now we have to think and define our path and select one path to focus on, Thank you.
Turk_Translation_4: We should now ponder and set our direction and choose one path only. Thanks

Urdu: اس بات میں کوئی شک نہیں ہے کہ جماعت الدعوہ میں شامل اکثریت لشکر طیبہ کے ان کارکنوں ہی کی ہے جو کہ لشکر طیبہ کے کالعدم قرار دئے جانے کے بعد جماعت الدعوہ پاکستان کے نام سے قائم جماعت میں شامل ہو گئے تھے،
Turk_Translation_1: There is no doubt in this that majority of the members of Jamaat-ud-Dawa are the members of Lashker-e-Tayyaba, who joined the party named Jamaat-ud-Dawa Pakistan after Lashker-e-Tayyaba was invalidated.
Turk_Translation_2: There is no doubt that majority of the workers of Jama'athud Da'wah are the previous members of Lashkar-e-Taiba who joint the group called Jama'athud Da'wah Pakistan, after Lashkar-e-Taiba was rendered inexistent.
Turk_Translation_3: There is no doubt that the elements of Jamat-ud-dawa include majority of those people who belong to Lashkar-e-Taiba which is a banned organization, is now established and operating with a new name Jamat-ud-dawa Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: There is no doubt that the majority of the movement league are from the Tayaba Group, who joined the league after the inception of Pakistan.

Urdu: تاہم اس کے بعد ان کارکنوں نے امدادی کاموں کو ترجیح دی اور اب بھارت کے پُر زور اصرار پر اقوام متحدہ نے اسے بھی کالعدم قرار دے دیا ہے اور حکومت پاکستان بھی ان کے خلاف کریک ڈاؤن جاری رکھے ہوئے ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Although these members preferred subsidiary activities and now after India's great persistence, The United Nation has invalidated it also and Government of Pakistan is continuing the crack down against them.
Turk_Translation_2: However, after that, the members gave preference to social work, and now even Jama'athud Da'wah was rendered inexistent by the United Nations, due to the pressure applied by India and the crackdown being enforced by the Pakistani government.
Turk_Translation_3: However after that more focus was diverted towards humanitarian activities and now on India's strong request , the United Nations has also banned it and the government of Pakistan has also implemented a crack down on this organization.
Turk_Translation_4: However, after that, this leagues obstructed aid campaigns, and now on India's insistence, United Nations has declared them as the enemy and even the Government of Pakistan is cracking down on them.

Urdu: میرے خیال میں اگر یہ جہادی گروپس مذہبی انتہا پسندی چھوڑ کر دینی اور امدادی سرگرمیاں جاری رکھیں تو زیادہ بہتر۔
Turk_Translation_1: In my opinion, it is better if Jihadi groups leave religious extremism and continue religious and subsidiary activities.
Turk_Translation_2: I believe that if Jihadi groups leave religious fundamentalism and take up social efforts, that would be better.
Turk_Translation_3: In my opinion if these Jihadi groups leave religious extremism and get focused towards religion and humanitarian assistance then it is much better.
Turk_Translation_4: In my opinion, if these Jihadi groups quit this religious fanaticism, and try helping instead, then it would be better for all.

Urdu: پاکستان ميں موجود دہشتگر تنظيميں جنہوں نے جہاد کے نام پر پيشہ وارانہ جرائم پيشہ لوگ پال رکھے ہيں يہ اور ان ملاوؤں کے ’بڑے‘ وہی ہيں جو پاکستان کو پليدستان اور جانے کيا کيا کہتے رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Terrorist groups present in Pakistan, who support professional criminals and the heads of those Mullahs are those who call Pakistan the land of destruction and what not.
Turk_Translation_2: The present terrorist groups that bring up criminals in the name of Jihad, and the elders of these Mullas, are the same people who used to call 'Pakistan' 'Palidistan', and who knows what else.
Turk_Translation_3: The terrorist organizations present in Pakistan which have used the name of Jihad to induct and nurture professional killers and criminals and their molana's are the same people who called Pakistan 'Plaeedistan' meaning un clean land. These are the people who use bad named for Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: The terrorist organizations present in Pakistan are employing professional criminals in the name of Jihad, the mentors of these and the mullahs are the same people who called Pakistan, Paleedistan and what not from time to time.

Urdu: اب يہ پاکستان کو تباہ کرنے ميں کوئی کسر نہيں چھوڑ رہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And now they are doing everything to destroy Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Now they are not leaving any stone unturned in destroying Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: Now they are trying their best to destroy Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: They are not letting any stone unturned in the destruction of Pakistan.

Urdu: اصل ميں يہ مسلمان تو کيا انسان کہلوانے کے حقدار نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: In reality, they do not even deserve to be called Human beings, let alone Muslims.
Turk_Translation_2: Actually, these are not even fit to be called human beings, let alone 'Muslims'.
Turk_Translation_3: In reality they don't even get close to be called a Muslin, in fact they deserve to be called animals or barbarians
Turk_Translation_4: They do not deserve to be called humans let alone muslims.

Urdu: پاکستان کو ان شرپسندوں سے پاک کیے بغير ملکی سلامتی خطرہ ميں رہےگي۔
Turk_Translation_1: Without cleaning Pakistan from these evil doers, the country's existence will be in jeopardy.
Turk_Translation_2: Without cleaning Pakistan of these mischief mongers, the national security will remain at risk.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan security will stay at risk until these extremists are not eradicated from Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Without rooting these miscreants out of Pakistan, the national security will be at risk.

Urdu: کيا اب بھی يہ سوچنے کی گنجائش ہے کہ ان مفسدوں پر پابندی لگائی جائے کہ نہ؟
Turk_Translation_1: Can we still afford to think if we should ban these mutinous or not?
Turk_Translation_2: Can we still think about whether or not to put a ban on these mischief mongers?
Turk_Translation_3: Should we still think that the innocent people will be charged with rules and regulation?
Turk_Translation_4: Is there still room for consideration whether these scoundrels should be banned?

Urdu: متشدد ملاوؤں کی اس دنيا ميں کہيں جگہ نہيں جنکا کام ہی قتل کرانا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In this world of callous leaders, there is no place for those whose work is only to kill.
Turk_Translation_2: There is no place on earth for extremist Mullahs whose only work is to cause killings.
Turk_Translation_3: In this feurious world the job is war,their work is only to kill.
Turk_Translation_4: There is no place in this world for extremist mullahs whose only purpose is to kill.

Urdu: اس خبر سے دل چور چور ہو رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This news breaks my heart to pieces.
Turk_Translation_2: This news tore my heart.
Turk_Translation_3: With this news my heart is broken.
Turk_Translation_4: Heart is breaking into pieces on this news.

Urdu: یہ کیسی دنیا ہے جہاں اللہ کے دین اسلام کہ ایک اہم رکن کا آج نام بھی لینے والے کے لیے اس دنیا میں جینا مشکل ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: What kind of world is this where it is hard to live for one who takes the name of one major pillar of Islam, religion of Allah.
Turk_Translation_2: What kind of world is that in which it has become difficult for those who even take the name of one of the important parts of the religion of Allah, Islam.

Turk_Translation_1: Most of us have no time to think of noises on one type or another.
Turk_Translation_2: Mischief mongers did not leave Pakistan or the founder of Pakistan. They did not have to face any reaction.
Turk_Translation_3: These thugs did not even forgive Pakistan and the founder of Pakistan, they did not face any reaction.
Turk_Translation_4: By the way,vegabonds even did not tolerated newly existed Pakistan and its founder.But they have never faced any reaction.

Urdu: الٹا اسی پاکستان کے سينے پہ مونگ دل رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: They become part of our daily lives.
Turk_Translation_2: Contrary to that, they are pecking at the chest of Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: On the contrary, we are writing our hearts on the chest of Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: In return,creating problems for the same country,Pakistan

Urdu: ایک مسلم لیگ ن رہتی تھی اس نے بھی اٹھارہویں ترمیم کا مسودہ بنا کر پیپلز پارٹي کے حوالے کر دیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: But there is something to be thought of-does noise affect our lives in some harmful ways.
Turk_Translation_2: There used to be one Muslim League (n), but they also made the rough version of the 18th amendment and handed it over to the Peoples Party.
Turk_Translation_3: One Muslim League N was left, even they made a draft of the 18th amendment and gave it to People's Party.
Turk_Translation_4: Only Muslim League (N) was left, she also handed over the draft of 18th amendment to Peoples Party.

Urdu: اس سے قبل ایم کیو ایم اور مسلم لیگ ق اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسودے قومی اسمبلی اور سینٹ میں جمع کرا چکی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: already there is evidence that it does so in several ways. It has been recognized for a long time.
Turk_Translation_2: Before that, MQM and Muslim League (q) had already handed in rough versions of the 18th amendment to the national assembly and senate.
Turk_Translation_3: Before this, MQM and Muslim League Q have made and submitted a draft of the 18th amendment in the National Assembly and the Senate.
Turk_Translation_4: Before this MQM and Muslim League (Q) has already submitted the draft of 18th amendment in assembly and senate.

Urdu: ابھی تک تو یہی لگتا ہے کہ اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسدودے ایک سیاسی چال ہیں اور کوئی بھی اس ترمیم کو منظور کرانے میں مخلص نہیں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Now that exposure to noise high intensity leads to loss of hearing. There have been cases of boiler-makers, for example, whose suffer from occupational deafness.
Turk_Translation_2: It still seems that the copies of the 18th amendment is a political trickery, and no one is sincere about accepting that amendment.
Turk_Translation_3: Till now it seems that drafts of the 18th amendment is a political trick and no one is sincere in getting this amendment approved.
Turk_Translation_4: Till now it appears that 18th amendment was a political move and none of the party is sincere in its approval.

Urdu: یہی وجہ ہے کہ ابھی تک کسی نے اسمبلی یا سینٹ کے فلور پر اس ترمیم کے حق میں واویلہ نہیں مچایا اور نہ ہی ایوان کو مجبور کیا ہے کہ وہ اس ترمیم کو منظور کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: More recently it has also been found that people who are continuously exposed to other loud noises require protection of the ear.
Turk_Translation_2: This is why no fuss was made in the assembly or on the floor of senate over this amendment, and the parliament was not forced into accepting the amendment.
Turk_Translation_3: This is the reason why no one has made a fuss in the assembly or senate floor in the favor of this amendment nor has forced the assembly to approve this change.
Turk_Translation_4: This is why nobody has raised voice in the favor of this amendment in senate or assembly and neither forced the House to approve the amendment.

Urdu: ایسے لگتا ہے اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسودے جمع کرا کے ان پارٹيوں نے گونگلوؤں سے مٹی جھاڑ لی ہے یعنی کل کو یہ کہنے کے قابل ہو گئے ہیں کہ ہم نے تو ترمیم جمع کرا دی تھی حکومتی سپیکر نے کاروائی ہی نہیں کی۔
Turk_Translation_1: If we live in industrial areas which are growing with every passing year, there is the deafening noise produced by the speakers in house or shops, radio sets in the neighborhood, school children at play or at chorus practice of arithmetical tables, and so on.
Turk_Translation_2: It looks as if the parties just wanted to get the thing off their backs by submitting the rough versions, so that tomorrow, they may say that we had submitted our versions of the amendment, but the government speaker did not take action.
Turk_Translation_3: It seems like that after submitting the drafts of 18th amendment, these parties have done their part that is they will be able to say this tomorrow that we submitted the draft, government speaker did not take any action.
Turk_Translation_4: It seems that by submitted the draft of 18th amendment these parties has beaten around the bushes means they can claim that we had submitted the amendment but the ruling party's speaker did not proceed.

Urdu: ایم کیو ایم حکومت کی اتحادی، مسلم لیگ ن حکومت کی درپردہ حلیف اور مسلم لیگ ق سترہویں ترمیم پاس کرنے والی جماعت تو پھر کیسے ہو سکتا ہے یہ جماعتیں سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے میں مخلص ہوں۔
Turk_Translation_1: MQM is i coalation with government, Muslim League(N) is secret partnership with government and Muslim League(Q) is the party that passed 17Th ammendment, then how it is possible that these parties are sincere in abolishing the 17Th Amendment
Turk_Translation_2: MQM coalition partner of government, Muslim League N an underhand ally of government and Muslim league Q the party to approve the seventeenth amendment then how is it possible that these parties can be sincere to approve the disapprove amendment.
Turk_Translation_3: MQM the government, Muslim League N in the opposition and Muslim League Q was the party who passed 17th amendment so how is it possible that these parties will be sincere in finishing the 17th amendment.
Turk_Translation_4: MQM an ally of government, Muslim League (N) secret friend and Muslim League (Q) has approved the 17th amendment, then how is it possible that they are sincere in removing 17th amendment.

Urdu: یہ تو رنگ لگا کر شہیدوں میں نام لکھوانے کا بہانہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is the way to get ones name entered in the list of martyrs by just getting painted.
Turk_Translation_2: its just like writing your name amongst shaheeds by just putting color on yourself.
Turk_Translation_3: This is what is called getting credit for nothing.
Turk_Translation_4: It is like painting red to be counted amongst martyred.

Urdu: پیپلز پارٹي کو تو ویسے ہی سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے کی جلدی نہیں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The Peoples Party is otherwise not in hurry to end the seventeenth ammendment.
Turk_Translation_2: Peoples Party anyway is not in a hurry to dismiss the seventeenth amendment.
Turk_Translation_3: People's party is already not in a hurry about finishing 17th amendment.
Turk_Translation_4: Peoples Party is not what so ever in a hurry to remove 17th amendment.

Urdu: بھلا کوئی کیسے اپنے ہاتھ کٹوانے کا سوچ سکتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: How any one can think of getting his own hands cut.
Turk_Translation_2: How would one think of getting his own hands cut.
Turk_Translation_3: How can someone think of cutting their own hands?
Turk_Translation_4: Nobody can think of cutting his own hands.

Urdu: جب تک ذرداری صدر ہیں سترہویں ترمیم ختم ہونے والی نہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Seventeenth Ammendment cannot be abolished till Zardari is the President.
Turk_Translation_2: as long as Zardari is the president, seventeenth amendment is not going to be cancelled.
Turk_Translation_3: 17th amendment will not be canceled until Zardari is the President.
Turk_Translation_4: As long Zardari is President 17th amendment will be there.

Urdu: یہی ہمارے ایک سروے میں اکثریت کی رائے تھی اور ہے بھی سچ۔
Turk_Translation_1: This was the opinion of majority in one of our survey and it is also correct.
Turk_Translation_2: this is an opinion of a majority in our survey and so is the truth.
Turk_Translation_3: This was the opinion of the majority in our survey and it is also true.
Turk_Translation_4: It was majority's opinion in our one survey and a fact too.

Urdu: اگر سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنی ہوتی تو پھر ذرداری صدر کبھی نہ بنتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Zardari would not have opted to be the President, if seventeenth ammendment was to be abolished.
Turk_Translation_2: if the seventeenth amendment was to be cancelled then Zardari would never had become the president.
Turk_Translation_3: If 17th amendment was to be discarded then Zardari would have never become the president.
Turk_Translation_4: If 17th amendment ought to be removed then Zardari wont become president.

Urdu: اب تو وہ صدر پرویز سے بھی زیادہ طاقتور شخص ہیں کیونکہ وہ صدر ہونے کیساتھ ساتھ پیپلز پارٹی کے چیئرمین بھی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Now he is more powerful than President Musharraf, since along with President he is also the chairman of Peoples Party.
Turk_Translation_2: Now he is even more powerful that president Musharaf as along with being the president he is also the chairman of the Peoples party.
Turk_Translation_3: Now he is even more powerful than President Parvez Musharaf. Because with being the president, he is also the chairman of the People's Party.
Turk_Translation_4: Now he is more powerful then President Pervez as along with the President he is the Chairman of Peoples Party.

Urdu: جب تک وہ صدر ہیں سترہویں ترمیم قائم ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The seventeenth ammendment is there till he is the president.
Turk_Translation_2: as long as he is the president, the seventeenth amendment will remain intact.
Turk_Translation_3: 17th amendment is valid until he is the president.
Turk_Translation_4: Till he is president 17th amendment is there.

Urdu: سیاسی جماعتوں کو سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے کیلیے پہلے صدر ذرداری کو ایوان صدارت سے رخصت کرنا پڑے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Political Parties will have to remove President Zardari first, in order to abolish the seventeenth ammendment.
Turk_Translation_2: in order to cancel the seventeenth amendment, the political parties will first have to dismiss president Zardari from the presidency.
Turk_Translation_3: In order to finish the 17th amendment, the political parties will have to bid Zardari farewell from the president house.
Turk_Translation_4: For removing 17th amendment political parties has to depart President Zardari from President house first.

Urdu: ایسا نہ ایم کیو ایم چاہتی ہے اور نہ دوسری جماعتیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is not the will of MQM nor of other parties.
Turk_Translation_2: neither MQM wants this nor other parties.
Turk_Translation_3: Neither MQM nor other parties want this.
Turk_Translation_4: Neither MQM wants it nor the other parties.

Urdu: ہمارے خاندان کے اکثر بزرگ مزدور طبقے سے تعلق رکھتے تھے
Turk_Translation_1: In our family, most of the people are of the laborer type.
Turk_Translation_2: most of the elders from our family belonged to the labor community.
Turk_Translation_3: Most of the elders in our family belong to labor class.
Turk_Translation_4: Most elders of our family belonged to labor class.

Urdu: اور جب بچپن میں ہم اپنے چچا، ماموں وغیرہ کو دیہاڑی لگاتے دیکھتے تو دل میں یہی خواہش پیدا ہوتی کہ اللہ ہمیں جسمانی مشقت والی مزدوری سے بچانا۔
Turk_Translation_1: And in our childhood, when we used to see our uncles toil, we used to wish in our hearts that Allah save us from labor that is hard on the body.
Turk_Translation_2: in our childhood when we used to see our uncles doing labor work, we used to pray to Allah: that please save us from this hard labor work.
Turk_Translation_3: During your childhood when we our uncles doing their work we prayed Allah to protect us from physical labor.
Turk_Translation_4: And when we in our childhood we used to see our uncles doing strenuous labor it gave birth to this desire in our heart that God protects us from strenuous physical labor.

Urdu: اس سے بچنے کیلئے ہم نے روزنامہ امروز کے ایڈیٹر کو خط لکھا اور پوچھا کہ ہم میٹرک کے بعد کیا کریں کہ ہمیں جسمانی مشقت نہ کرنی پڑے۔
Turk_Translation_1: To save ourselves from this, we wrote a letter to the editor of the Amroz daily, asking him what we can do after metric to save ourselves from having to toil.
Turk_Translation_2: to avoid this we wrote a letter to the editor of the daily Amroz and asked him what should we do after matriculation so that we don't have to do labor work.
Turk_Translation_3: To avoid this we wrote to the editor of monthly Amroz to ask him what to do after matriculation so that we would not have to do physical labor.
Turk_Translation_4: To seek refuge from it we wrote a letter to the editor of daily Amroz and asked “what should we do after matriculation exams that we don’t have to go through strenuous physical labor.

Urdu: ایڈیٹر نے جواب میں لکھا کہ ڈاکٹر یا انجنئر بن جاؤ اور فلاں فلاں مضامین پکڑ لو۔
Turk_Translation_1: The editor wrote in reply to become a doctor or engineer and take such and such subjects.
Turk_Translation_2: the editor wrote in reply that we should select certain subjects and become doctors or engineers.
Turk_Translation_3: Editor in reply wrote that we should become Doctor or Engineer and study these courses.
Turk_Translation_4: Editor in his reply wrote that we should become a doctor or an engineer and should opt for such and such subjects to study.

Urdu: ہمارا رجحان شروع سے ہی انجنئرنگ کی طرف تھا اور ہم نے میٹرک میں بھی بیالوجی کی بجائے ٹیکنیکل ڈرائنگ ہی پڑھی۔
Turk_Translation_1: My focus was always on engineering, and after metric, instead of Biology, I took Technical Drawing.
Turk_Translation_2: right from beginning my trend was towards engineering and I had selected technical drawing instead of Biology in metric as well.
Turk_Translation_3: We were inclined towards engineering and in matriculation we studied Technical drawing instead of Biology.
Turk_Translation_4: From the beginning we were inclined toward engineering and also in metric we opted for technical drawing instead of biology.

Urdu: لیکن ایف ایس سی میں داخلے کے وقت بڑے بھائی نے مجبور کیا کہ ہم میڈیکل میں ایف ایس سی کر کے ڈاکٹر بنیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: But while entering the FSC, my elder brother forced me to do FSC in medicine and become a doctor.
Turk_Translation_2: but at the time of admission in F.Sc. my elder brother forced me to become a doctor after doing F.Sc. in medical.
Turk_Translation_3: But at the time of admissions in FSc the elder brother forced us to study medical in FSc.
Turk_Translation_4: But at the time of admission in FSC elder brother insisted on doing FSC in Pre Medical and become a doctor.

Urdu: ہم نے بمشکل ایک ماہ ہی بیالوجی پڑھی اور جب کچھ بھی پلے نہ پڑا تو اس کے بدلے حساب کا مضمون لے لیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: I studied Biology for a month with great difficulty, and when I still could not understand anything, I took maths as a subject instead.
Turk_Translation_2: I studied Biology for hardly a month and then when nothing worked out, I took maths as an alternate subject.
Turk_Translation_3: We hardly studied biology for a month before we started studying maths.
Turk_Translation_4: We hardly studied biology for a month and when we couldn’t understand a thing we swapped biology for Mathematics.

Urdu: یعنی جسمانی مشقت سے ڈر نے ہمیں انجنئر بنا دیا اور اب ہم اپنے خاندان کے بہت سے ہمجولوں میں اچھی پوزیشن پر ہیں جس پر ہم خدا کا ہر وقت شکر ادا کرتے رہتے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: So the scare of having to work made me an engineer, and today I am in a very good condition compared to many of my same aged relatives, for which I am always thanking Allah.
Turk_Translation_2: means that the fear from labor work made me an engineer and now I am in a better position than my fellows in the family for which I am always thankful to God.
Turk_Translation_3: Means that to avoid physical labour we became engineer and we are in better position than many friends in our family and we thank Allah for it.
Turk_Translation_4: It means that the fear of strenuous physical jobs made us to become engineers and now we are well placed among many the youth of our family and for this we are thankful to God

Urdu: یہ بات ہمیں اس وقت یاد آئی جب ہم اپنے دو جوان بیٹوں کیساتھ پرانے گھر کے قالین اٹھانے کی کوشش کر رہے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: I remembered this when I was trying to lift the carpet of my old house along with my two young sons.
Turk_Translation_2: I remembered that when I along with my two sons were trying to remove the carpets from our old house.
Turk_Translation_3: We remembered this when with out 2 young sons we were trying to lift carpets of old hour.
Turk_Translation_4: This we remembered when we were trying to lift carpet from our old house with our two young sons.

Urdu: ابھی کام کرتے آدھا گھنٹہ بھی نہیں ہوا تھا کہ چھوٹا بیٹا بولا “ڈیڈ لگتا ہےمیں اس کام کیلیے پیدا نہیں ہوا”۔
Turk_Translation_1: It was not half an hour since we started working, that the younger son said "Dad, it looks as if I was not made for this job"
Turk_Translation_2: It was only half an hour since he started working that the little boy said " Daddy, I am not born to do this"
Turk_Translation_3: Now it hasn't been half an hour while we were working that the small son said "Daddy it seems that I am not born for this job"
Turk_Translation_4: It was not even 30 minutes for us working that our younger son said “Dad it feels like I am not born for this job.

Urdu: ہم نے کہا اگر یہ سچ ہے تو پھر ہماری طرح خوب پڑھو اور جسمانی مشقت سے جان چھڑا لو۔
Turk_Translation_1: We said, if that is true, then study a lot like us, and free yourself from bodily pain.
Turk_Translation_2: I said that if this is true then study a lot like us and get rid of the physical labor.
Turk_Translation_3: We said that if so study good like us and build up your body.
Turk_Translation_4: We said if it is true then study hard like us and free yourself from physical labor.

Urdu: بیٹا کہنے لگا پڑھ تو میں رہا ہوں اور پڑھ بھی جاؤں گا مگر یہ کام میرے سے نہیں ہوتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: The son said that I am studying and will continue studying, but I cannot do this work.
Turk_Translation_2: The son said, "I am studying and I will get through it also but it is the work that I can not do"
Turk_Translation_3: The son started saying I am studying already, will be studying more but this work is not done by me.
Turk_Translation_4: Son started saying that I am studying and will complete my studies but I can’t do this work .

Urdu: جیسے تیسے ہم تینوں نے تین گھنٹے میں وہ کام ختم کیا اور گھر لوٹ آئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Anyway, the three of us finished that work in three hours and returned.
Turk_Translation_2: Whatsoever we did that work in three hours and came back home.
Turk_Translation_3: Any how we three managed to complete the work within three hours and returned home.
Turk_Translation_4: Three of us somehow managed to finish the job and got back home.

Urdu: کہنے کا مطلب یہ ہے کہ آدمی اگر منزل کا تعین کر لے چاہے اس کے پیچھے جو بھی وجہ کارفرما ہو تو کوئی اسے منزل پانے سے نہیں روک سکتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: My purpose of saying this is that if a person has set a goal, whatever be the reason behind it, no one can stop him from achieving his goal.
Turk_Translation_2: The point of saying is that if a person picks his destiny, whatever is the reason behind it, no one can stop him from achieving that destiny.
Turk_Translation_3: The meaning of saying this is that if a man decides on one destiny then whatever comes afterward will not stop him to accomplish his destination.
Turk_Translation_4: What it means is that when a man decides the destination no matter what were the motives behind this no one can stop him from getting it.

Urdu: ہاں اگر آپ کو پتہ ہی نہیں ہے کہ کرنا کیا ہے تو پھر آپ کا اللہ ہی حافظ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: But if you do not even know what you have to do, then Allah alone is your protector.
Turk_Translation_2: Here if you do not know what you have to do then God help you!
Turk_Translation_3: Yes and if you don't really know what you have to do then Allah is the only protector for you.
Turk_Translation_4: But if you don’t even know what you have to do then God be with you.

Urdu: کہتے ہیں کہ مرے ہوئے کو برا مت کہو مگر کیا کریں ہمیں بینظیر کی پہلی برسی پر بھِی ان میں برائیاں ہی نظر آتی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: They say that you should not speak bad about the dead, but what can I do, even after one year of Benazir's death, I can only see faults in her.
Turk_Translation_2: It is said that do not say bad about the dead. But what shall we do, we see only bad things in Benazir even on her first death anniversary.
Turk_Translation_3: There is a saying that never say bad for a dead but what to do, also at the first death anniversary of Benazeer we only see bad in her.
Turk_Translation_4: It is said that don't accuse the dead, but can't help it as we see only evils in her on the first anniversary of Benazir.

Urdu: بینظیر نے اپنے مفاد کی خاطر آزادی کی جنگ لڑنے والے سکھوں کی لسٹ بھارت کو مہیا کر کے ایک طرف سکھوں کی تحریک آزادی کو کچل دیا اور دوسری طرف بھارت کو پنجاب کی تحریک دبانے کے بعد کشمیر میں پوری توجہ مرکوز کرنے کا موقع فراہم کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: For personal interests, Benazir handed over the list of Sikhs who were fighting for independence to India, at the same time crushing the Sikhs independence movement and also allowing India to transfer its complete attention to Pakistan, having taken care of the Punjab movement.
Turk_Translation_2: Benazir, for her selfish purpose, crushed the independence movement of the Sikhs after giving the list of their names who were fighting for freedom on one hand and on the other gave India the chance to keep its full attention on Kashmir after them helping to suppress Punjab Movement.
Turk_Translation_3: Benazeer for her own benefit forwarded to India the Sikhs' army, who were to fight the war of independent. On one side the independent movement of the Sikhs was collapsed and on the other side gave chance for India to concentrate on Kashmir after pushing down the Punjab movement.
Turk_Translation_4: On one side Benazir crushed independence movement of Sikhs by handing over the list of Sikh freedom fighters to India for her own sake and on the other hand provided India an opportunity to fully concentrate in Kashmir after crushing the movement in Punjab.

Urdu: بینطیر اور نواز شریف کی اقتدار کی رشہ کشی تاریخ کا حصہ ہے جس نے ملک کو کئِ سال پیچھے کی طرف دھکیل دیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: The Russia wars in the regimes of Benazir and Nawaz Sherif have become a part of history, which pushed the country many years back.
Turk_Translation_2: Tug of war between Benazir and Nawaz Sharif rule is part of the history, which has pushed the country back many years.
Turk_Translation_3: It is the part of the distraction from the leadership of Benazeer and Nawaz Sharif which have pushed the country to many years backwards.
Turk_Translation_4: The greed of Benazir and Nawaz Sharif for government is a part of history which pushed the country back for many years.

Urdu: بینظیر نے جلاوطنی کے دوران کشمیر اور ایٹمی پروگرام پر منفی بیانات کا سلسلہ جاری رکھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Benazir continued to speak ill about Kashmir and the atomic program throughout exile.
Turk_Translation_2: Benazir continued to give negative comments on Kashmir and the nuclear program after being exiled.
Turk_Translation_3: During exile Benazeer continued on keeping the series beneficiary information of Kashmir and Atomic Program.
Turk_Translation_4: During her exile Benazir continued to give negative statements on Kashmir and Atomic Program.

Urdu: بینظیر نے نواز شریف کیساتھ لندن معاہدے کی خلاف ورزی کرتے ہوئے جنرل مشرف کیساتھ ڈیل کر لی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Benazir Bhutto struck a deal with Musharraf, going against her London Treaty with Nawaz Sharif
Turk_Translation_2: Baenazir went against the pact made with Nawaz Shareef in London by making a deal with General Musharaf
Turk_Translation_3: Benazir violated the London agreement with Nawaz Sharif and made a deal with General Musharaf.
Turk_Translation_4: Benazir made a deal with Pervez Musharraf while betraying the London agreement with Nawaz Sharif.

Urdu: بینظیر نے اپنے دور اقتدار میں اپنے خاوند کو کھل کر پیسہ کمانے کا موقع دیا اور اسی وجہ سے وہ مسٹر ٹین پرسینٹ کہلائے
Turk_Translation_1: Benazir allowed her husband to openly earn money, in her era, which is why he came to be known as Mr. Ten Percent.
Turk_Translation_2: During the time of Baenazir's leadership she gave an open hand policy to her family members to earn money, and due to this he got to be known as Mr 10 Percent.
Turk_Translation_3: during her rule, Benazir gave a free hand to her husband to make as much money that is why he is known as Mr. Ten percent.
Turk_Translation_4: During her reign Benazir provided her husband the opportunity of making money and because of this he popularized as Mr. 10 percent.

Urdu: بینظیر کے دور میں اس کا بھائی قتل ہوا اور جس کے قاتل ابھِی تک سزا سے بچے ہوئے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: In Benazir's era, her brother was killed, and his killer is still not been punished.
Turk_Translation_2: In the time of Baenazir her brother got murdered, and his murderers are still at large.
Turk_Translation_3: during Benazir's rule his brother got killed but his murderers are still safe from any punishment.
Turk_Translation_4: Benazir brother was killed during her reign whose assassins are still safe.

Urdu: بینظیر نے عورت ہونے کے باوجود عورتوں کے حقوق کی جنگ لڑنے سے گریز کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Despite being a woman, Benazir avoided fighting for women rights.
Turk_Translation_2: Besides being a woman Baebnazir did not fight for the rights of women.
Turk_Translation_3: besides being a woman herself, Benazir avoided fighting for women's rights.
Turk_Translation_4: Though a woman still Benazir avoided to fight for the rights of women.

Urdu: جس طرح بینظیر نے اپنے والد کی لاش پر سیاست کی اسی طرح اب ان کے رنڈوے خاوند ان کی لاش پر سیاست کر رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: In a way similar to how Benazir did politics on her father's corpse, her widower husband is now doing politics on her corpse.
Turk_Translation_2: The way in which Baenazir did politics on her fathers dead body, in the same way her followers are doing politics on the dead bodies of her family.
Turk_Translation_3: just like Benazir did her politics over her fathers dead body, similarly her widower is doing the same over her dead body.
Turk_Translation_4: Just like Benazir politicized her father's dead body similarly his widower husband politicizing her dead body.

Urdu: بینظیر کو دو دفعہ حکومت ملی مگر وہ اپنے والد کے سیاسی قتل کے مجرموں کو سزا تو کیا ان کیخلاف مقدمہ بھی درج نہ کرا سکیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Benazir came to power twice, but let alone bring the people guilty for the political killing of her father to justice, she could not even file a case against them.
Turk_Translation_2: Baenazir got to be a leader twice and in that time punishing her fathers murders at one side she didn't even file charges against them.
Turk_Translation_3: Benazir came into power twice but she could not punish her the culprits of her father's political murder even she couldn't register a case against them.
Turk_Translation_4: Benazir reigned twice but not only she failed to punish her father's political murder but could not file a case against them.

Urdu: مشرقی پاکستان کو ہم سے الگ ہوئے سینتیس سال ہو گئے اور ہمارے عوام اور حکمرانوں کی بے حسی کی انتہا دیکھیں کہ کسی نے اس دن نہ سوگ منایا اور نہ اپنی غلطیوں پر ماتم کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: It is 37 years since East Pakistan was separated from us, and look at the height of insensitivity on the part of the public and the rulers, that no one ever mourned or expressed sorrow over their mistakes.
Turk_Translation_2: It has been 37 years since the separation of eastern Pakistan, and sadly no leader condemns this day nor do they call it a black day.
Turk_Translation_3: it has been 37 years since East Pakistan separated from us but look at the extreme of senselessness of our people and leaders that we never celebrate the mourning day.
Turk_Translation_4: It has been thirty seven years since the separation of East Pakistan and look at the height of insensitivity of our people and rulers that neither did anyone mourn nor grieved over their mistakes on that day.

Urdu: ہونا تو یہ چاہیے تھا کہ ہم سولہ دسمبر والے دن کو عبرت کے طور پر مناتے اور اس طرح کی تدابیر کرتے کہ ایسا حادثہ دوبارہ وقوع پذیر نہ ہو۔
Turk_Translation_1: We should have been observing 16th December as a day of reflection, and made plans to prevent the re occurrence of such incidents.
Turk_Translation_2: It should have been so that we would celebrate this 16th September as a black day, and take steps so such a sad incident never takes place again.
Turk_Translation_3: what should have happened instead is that we should have celebrated 16th December as a didactic day and take such measures that this kind of incident don't take place again.
Turk_Translation_4: It should have happened that we should look upon 16th December as a black day and should take appropraite steps so that this type of accident does not happen again.

Urdu: اس دن ہم بنگلہ دیش کے لوگوں کو خیرسگالی کے پیغامات بھیجتے اور انہیں دوبارھ اپنےقریب لانے کی کوشش کرتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: We should have been sending greetings to the people of Bangladesh on this day and been trying to bring them closer to ourselves.
Turk_Translation_2: On this day we should have send the Bangali's letters of consolation and tried to bring them closer to ourselves.
Turk_Translation_3: on this day we could send greeting to the people of Bangladesh and try to bring them closer to ourselves again.
Turk_Translation_4: On that day, we send humanism messages to the people of Bangladesh and try to bring them closer to us.

Urdu: حکمران حمودالرحمن کمیشن کی فائل کو کھولتے اور اس میں مشرقی پاکستان کی علیحدگی کی وجوہات پر غور کرتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The ruler should have opened the Jamudur Rahman commission file and pondered over the causes of separation of West Pakistan, mentioned therein.

Turk_Translation_4: Rulers open the file of Mehmood-ul-Rehman Commission in order to study the reasons for the separation of East Pakistan.

Urdu: بنگلہ دیش میں پھنسے ہوئے بہاریوں کو واپس لانے کی تدبیر کرتے اور ان کی حوصلہ افزائی کیلیے انہیں تحائف بھیجتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: to help the people who are sick and in trouble in Bangladesh and for their safe return planning and for motivation gifts are sent to them.

Turk_Translation_4: They are making strategies to bring back the Beharis (ethnic class) stranded in Bangladesh and send them gifts to encourage them.

Urdu: لیکن ہم بے حس ہو چکے ہیں ہمارے پڑوس میں کوئی مر جائے ہمیں اس کی اب اطلاع نہیں ہوتی۔
Turk_Translation_1: we have no feeling, our neighbors get died and we dont even know about it

Turk_Translation_1: we don't care about brothers and sisters because we are selfish.

Turk_Translation_1: big crisis get over and we became normal and return to our routines.

Urdu: کاش جس طرح مشرقی اور مغربی جرمنی دوبارہ ایک ہو گئے اسی طرح مشرقی اور مغربی پاکستان بھی دوبارہ ایک ہو سکتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: As eastern Germany and western Germany merges together i wish if East and West Pakistan get together.

Turk_Translation_3: Only if East and West Pakistan could be one together just like East and West Germany was united once again.

Turk_Translation_1: we can be one again, if we scarifies for each other and get over with our selfishness.
